T09bsa032_u:1057: sa tato vinigṛhya dviradavaramupacārapuraḥsaramabhigamanaprayojanamenān paryapṛcchadājñāpyatāṃ kenārtha iti /

T09bsa032_u:1068: iti viniścitya sa mahātmā tvaritamavatīrya dviradavarāt pratigṛhyatāmiti samudyatakāñcanabhṛṅgārasteṣāṃ purastādavatasthe /

T09bsa032_u:1123: dravyeṣu bāhyeṣu ka eva vādo dadyāmahaṃ sve nayane śiro vā /

T09bsa032_u:1209: atha kadācinmūlaphalārthaṃ gatāyāṃ rājaputryāṃ putrayoḥ paripālananimittamāśramapadamaśūnyaṃ kurvāṇe rājaputre mārgareṇuparuṣīkṛtacaraṇaprajaṅghaḥ pariśramakṣāmanayanavadano daṇḍakāṣṭhāvabaddhaskandhāvasaktakamaṇḍalurbrāhmaṇaḥ patnyāḥ paricārakānayanārthaṃ samarpitadṛḍhasaṃdeśastaṃ deśamupajagāma /

T09bsa032_u:2116: tāvattvayā svabhihitaṃ hitakāmyayā metatkarmaṇā vidhivadarcayituṃ yatiṣye

T09bsa032_u:2241: mahatsaraḥ saṃniśritya praviviktamanojñāsu cchayādrumasamupagūḍhāsvasaṃnikṛṣṭaviniviṣṭāsu pṛthakpṛthakparṇaśālāsu vrataniyamaparā dhyānānuyuktamanaso vijahnaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2243: sa caiṣāṃ dhyānopadeśapravṛttāṃ kāmādīnavadarśanīṃ saṃvejanīyāṃ pravivekasantoṣavarṇabahulāṃ kuhanalapanakausīdyādidoṣavigarhaṇīmupaśamaprasādapaddhatiṃ tāṃ tāṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ cakāra sā cainān dāsī bahumānānurāgavaśā tathaiba paricacāra /
T09bsa032_u:2244: sā tasmātsaraso bisānyuddhṛtya mahatsu padminīparṇeṣu śucau tīrapradeśe samānvinyasya ca bhāgānkāṣṭhasaṃghaṭṭanaśabdena kālaṃ nivedyāpakrāmati sma /
T09bsa032_u:2247: ta evaṃ pravṛttā naiva parasparaṃ dadṛśuranyatra dharmaśravaṇakālāt /
T09bsa032_u:2248: teṣāmevaṃvidhena niravadyena śīlavṛttasamudācāreṇa pravivekābhiratyā dhyānapravaṇamānasatayā ca sarvatra yaśaḥ samupaśrutya śakro devānāmindrastatparīkṣānimittaṃ tatrābhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:2249: taccaiṣāṃ dhyānābhimukhatvaṃ kukāryeṣvaprasaṅgamanutkaṇṭhāṃ praśamābhirāmaṃ cāvasthānamavekṣya sthirataraguṇasambhāvanastatparīkṣānimittamavahitamanā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2253: atha dvipakalabhadaśanapāṇḍukomalāni samuddhṛtya prakṣālya ca bisāni marakataharitaprabheṣu padminīpatreṣu kamaladalakesaropahārālaṃkṛtānviracayya samānbhāgānkāṣṭhasaṃghaṭṭanaśabdena nivedya kālaṃ teṣāmṛṣīṇāmapasṛtāyāṃ tasyāṃ dāsyāṃ bodhisattvaparīkṣārthaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ prathamameva
T09bsa032_u:2255: pravartane hi duḥkhasya tiraskāre sukhasya ca /
T09bsa032_u:2258: padminīpatraṃ parivyākulīkṛtopahāramabhisamīkṣya gṛhītaḥ kenāpi me bisapratyaṃśa ityavadhṛtamatirapetacetaḥsaṃkṣobhasaṃrambhastata eva pratinivṛtya praviśya parṇaśālāyāṃ yathocitaṃ dhyānavidhimārebhe /
T09bsa032_u:2260: itare tvasya bhrātaro nūnamanena gṛhītaḥ pratyaṃśa iti manyamānā yathocitāneva svānsvānanukrameṇa bisabhāgānādāya yathāsvaṃ parṇaśālāsu paribhujya dhyāyanti sma /
T09bsa032_u:2261: evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame ca divase śakrastasya taṃ bisapratyaṃśamupanidadhe /
T09bsa032_u:2265: athāparāhṇasamaye dharmaśravaṇārthamṛṣayaste yathocittaṃ bodhisattvasya parṇaśālāṃ samabhigatā dadṛśvāṃsaścainaṃ kṛśataraśarīraṃ parikṣāmakapolanayanaṃ parimlānavadanaśobhamasampūrṇasvaragāmbhīryaṃ parikṣīṇamapyaparikṣīṇadhairyapraśamaguṇamabhinavendupriyadarśanamupetyopacārapuraḥsaraṃ sasambhramāḥ kimidamiti kārśyanimittamenamapṛcchan /
T09bsa032_u:2267: atha te tāpasāḥ parasparamīdṛśamanācāramasambhāvayantastatpīḍayā ca samupajātasaṃvegāḥ kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭamityuktvā vrīḍāvanatavadanāḥ samatiṣṭhanta /
T09bsa032_u:2268: śakraprabhāvācca samāvṛtajñānagativiṣayāḥ kuta idamiti na niścayamupajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2269: atha bodhisattvasyānujo bhrātā svamāvegamātmaviśuddhiṃ ca pradarśayañchapathātiśayamimaṃ cakāra
T09bsa032_u:2270: samṛddhicihnābharaṇaṃ sa gehaṃ prāpnotu bhāryāṃ ca mano 'bhirāmām /
T09bsa032_u:2271: samagratāmetu ca putrapautrairbisāni te brāhmaṇa yo hyahārṣīt // Jm_19.11
T09bsa032_u:2275: kāmeṣu tīvrāṃ sa karotvapekṣāṃ bisānyahārṣīddvijamukhya yaste // Jm_19.12
T09bsa032_u:2278: vayo 'pyapaśyanramatāṃ sa gehe bisāni yaste sakṛdapyahārṣīt // Jm_19.13 //
T09bsa032_u:2281: kṛtsnāṃ mahīṃ pātu sa rājavṛttyā lobhādahārṣīttava yo bisāni // Jm_19.14
T09bsa032_u:2283: purohitaḥ so 'stu narādhipasya mantrādinā svastyayayena yuktaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2284: satkāramāpnotu tathā ca rājñastavāpi yo nāma bisānyahārṣīt // Jm_19.15 //
T09bsa032_u:2287: arcantu taṃ jānapadāḥ sametya biseṣu lubdho na guṇeṣu yaste // Jm_19.16 //
T09bsa032_u:2289: catuḥśataṃ grāmavaraṃ samṛddhaṃ labdhvā narendrādupayātu bhoktum /
T09bsa032_u:2290: avītarāgo maraṇaṃ sa caitu lobhaṃ biseṣvapyajayanna yaste // Jm_19.17 //
T09bsa032_u:2294: mā rājataśca vyasanāni labdha bisārthamātmārthamaśīśamadyaḥ // Jm_19.18 //
T09bsa032_u:2296: vidyotamānāṃ bapuṣā śriyā ca patnītvamānīya narādhipastām /
T09bsa032_u:2299: ekākinī sā samatītya sādhūnsvādūpabhoge praṇayaṃ karotu /
T09bsa032_u:2300: satkāralabdhāṃ mudamudvahantī bisānyapaśyattava yā na dharmam // Jm_19.20
T09bsa032_u:2301: atha tatra dharmaśravaṇārthaṃ samāgatāstadvanādhyuṣitā yakṣadviradavānarāstāṃ kathāmupaśrutya parāṃ vrīḍāṃ saṃvegaṃ copajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2304: ālokasandhiṃ divasaiḥ karotu yastvayyapi praskhalito bisārtham // Jm_19.21
T09bsa032_u:2306: ṣaḍbhirdṛḍhaiḥ pāśaśataiḥ sa bandhaṃ prāpnotu ramyācca vanājjanāntam /
T09bsa032_u:2307: tīkṣṇāṅkaśākarṣaṇajā rujaśca yaste muniśreṣṭha bisānyahārṣīt // Jm_19.22
T09bsa032_u:2309: sa puṣpamālī trapughṛṣṭakaṇṭho yaṣṭayā hataḥ sarpamukhaṃ paraitu /
T09bsa032_u:2311: vaikakṣyabaddhaśca vased gṛheṣu laulyādahārṣīttava yo bisāni // Jm_19.23
T09bsa032_u:2313: yo naṣṭamityāha na cāsya naṣṭamiṣṭānsa kāmānadhigamya kāmam /
T09bsa032_u:2314: upaitu gehāśrita eva mṛtyuṃ bhavatsu yaḥ śaṅkata īdṛśaṃ vā // Jm_19.24 //
T09bsa032_u:2315: atha śakro devendrastena teṣāṃ kāmopabhogaprātikūlyasūcakena śapathātiśayena samutpāditavismayabahumānaḥ svenaiva vapuṣābhijvalatā tānṛṣīnabhigamya sāmarṣavaduvāca - mā tāvadbhoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2317: yānprāptumicchanti tapaḥśramaiśca tānkena kāmāniti kutsayadhve // Jm_19.25
T09bsa032_u:2319: saṃkṣepatastu śrūyatāṃ yadabhisamīkṣya kāmānna praśaṃsanti munayaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2320: kāmeṣu bandhamupayāti vadhaṃ ca lokaḥ śokaṃ klamaṃ bhayamanekavidhaṃ ca duḥkham /
T09bsa032_u:2321: kāmārthameva ca mahīpatayaḥ patanti dharmopamardarabhasā narakaṃ paratra
T09bsa032_u:2322: yatsauhṛdāni sahasā virasībhavanti yannītiśāṭhyamalinena pathā prayānti /
T09bsa032_u:2323: kīrtyā viyogamasukhaiḥ parataśca yogaṃ yatprāpnuvanti nanu kāraṇamatra kāmāḥ // Jm_19.27 //
T09bsa032_u:2324: iti hīnavimadhyamottamānāmiha cāmutra ca yadvadhāya kāmāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2326: atha śakro devānāmindrastasya tadvacanaṃ yuktamityabhinandya tena caiteṣāmṛṣīṇāṃ māhātmyenābhiprasāditamanāstebhyaḥ
T09bsa032_u:2331: viśuddhiḥ sthiracāritre tadetāni bisāni te // Jm_19.30 //
T09bsa032_u:2334: na bāndhavā naiva vayaṃ sahāyā na te naṭā nāpi viḍambakāḥ smaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2338: pitevācārya iva ca kṣantumarhati tadbhavān // Jm_19.32 //
T09bsa032_u:2340: kṣamāṃ ca tatrātmavatāṃ prapattumato 'pyadaścetasi mā sma kārṣīḥ //
T09bsa032_u:2342: tadevaṃ pravivekasukharasajñānāṃ viḍambaneva vihiṃseva ca kāmāḥ pratikūlā bhavanti /
T09bsa032_u:2352: 20. Śreṣṭhijātakam abhūtaguṇasaṃbhāvanā pratodasaṃcodaneva bhavati sādhūnāmiti guṇasaṃpādane
T09bsa032_u:2355: bodhisattvaḥ kila śrutakulavinayamahānakṣudranipuṇamatiraviṣamavyavahāraratiranekaśāstrābhyāsādālakṣitavacanasauṣṭhabaḥ karuṇānuvṛttyā samantato visyandamānadhanasamṛddhirmahāpradānairmahādhanatvād gṛhapatiratnasaṃmato 'nyatamasya rājñaḥ śreṣṭhī babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2358: atha kadācittasminmahāsattve rājakulamabhigate kenacideva karaṇīyena tasya śvaśrūrduhitaramavalokayituṃ tadgṛhamabhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:2359: kṛtābhyāgamanasatkārā ca saṃkathāprastāvāgataṃ svāṃ duhitaraṃ bodhisattvabhāryāṃ rahasi kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakaṃ paryapṛcchatkaccittvāṃ tāta bhartā nāvamanyate /
T09bsa032_u:2363: śīlaguṇasamudācāreṇa, pravrajito 'pi durlabhaḥ ka idānīṃ tādṛśaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2364: atha sā tasyā mātā jaropahataśrutismṛtitvāllajjāsaṃkucitākṣaraṃ tanayayā tadvacanamabhidhīyamānaṃ na samyagupadhārayāmāta /
T09bsa032_u:2366: sā sasvaramabhiruditā svāṃ duhitaramanuśocantī duḥkhāvegavaśātparidevanaparā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2367: kīdṛśastasya śīlaguṇasamudācāro ya evamanuraktaṃ svaṃ janamapahāya pravrajitaḥ? kiṃ vā tasya pravrajyayā?
T09bsa032_u:2369: kṣitipābhimatasya tasya vai vanavāse praṇatā matiḥ katham // Jm_20.2 //
T09bsa032_u:2371: kathamekapade rujaṃ vinā vibhavodgāri gṛhaṃ sa muktavān // Jm_20.3 //
T09bsa032_u:2376: śuciśīladhanaḥ kimāpnuyānna sa geheṣu vane yadīpsati // Jm_20.5 //
T09bsa032_u:2378: yatidharmaparaḥ sa nekṣate kimimaṃ dharmapathavyatikramam // Jm_20.6 //
T09bsa032_u:2380: na ghṛṇāpathameti mānasaṃ yadi vā dharmalavo 'pi sidhyati // Jm_20.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2381: atha sā bodhisattvasya patnī tena mātuḥ karuṇenākṛtakena paridevitena patipravrajyābhisaṃbandhena strīsvabhāvād vyathitahṛdayā sasaṃbhramā viṣādaviklavamukhī śokaduḥkhābhinipātasaṃkṣobhādvismṛtakathāprastāvasaṃbandhā pravrajito me
T09bsa032_u:2382: bharteti madvyavasthāpanārthamambā gṛhamidamabhigatā vipriyaśravaṇāditi niścayamupetya saparidevitaṃ sasvaraṃ rudatī mohamupajagāma bālā /
T09bsa032_u:2384: tacchrutvā prātiveśyamitrasvajanabandhuvargaḥ saṃśritajano brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaśca tasya gṛhapateranurāgavaśānugāḥ prāyaśaśca paurāstadgṛhamabhijagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2387: atha bodhisattvo rājakulāt svabhavanasamīpamupagataḥ sākrandaśabdaṃ svabhavanamavetya mahataśca janakāyasya saṃnipātaṃ svaṃ puruṣamanvādideśa jñāyatāṃ kimetaditi /
T09bsa032_u:2390: iti śrutvā kuto 'pyeṣa snehādevaṃgato janaḥ // Jm_20.9 //
T09bsa032_u:2392: atha sa mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtyā śuddhāśayaḥ pratyādiṣṭa iva tena vacasā samupajātavrīḍasaṃvegaścintāmāpede
T09bsa032_u:2395: gṛhābhimukha eva syāṃ yadi kiṃ mama pauruṣam // Jm_20.10 //
T09bsa032_u:2396: syāddoṣabhaktiḥ prathitā mayaivaṃ guṇeṣvavajñāvirasā ca vṛttiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2397: yāyāmataḥ sādhujane laghutvaṃ ki jīvitaṃ syācca tathāvidhasya // Jm_20.11
T09bsa032_u:2400: iti vicintya sa mahātmā tata eva pratinivṛtya rājñaḥ pratihārayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:2404: 'bravīt - icchāmi pravrajitum, tadabhyanujñātumarhati māṃ deva iti /
T09bsa032_u:2406: mayi sthite bandhusuhṛdviśiṣṭe tvaṃ kena duḥkhena vanaṃ prayāsi /
T09bsa032_u:2407: yannāpahartuṃ prabhutā mama syāddhanena nītyā balasaṃpadā vā // Jm_20.13
T09bsa032_u:2408: artho dhanairyadi gṛhāṇa dhanāni mattaḥ pīḍā kutaścidatha tāṃ pratiṣedhayāmi /
T09bsa032_u:2409: māṃ yācamānamiti bandhujanaṃ ca hitvā kiṃ vā tvamanyadabhivīkṣya vanaṃ prayāsi // Jm_20.14
T09bsa032_u:2410: iti sa mahātmā sasnehabahumānamabhihito rājñā sānunayamenamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2412: ato na duḥkhena vanaṃ prayāmi yamarthamuddiśya tu taṃ nibodha // Jm_20.15
T09bsa032_u:2414: dīkṣāmupāśrita iti prathito 'smi deva śokāśrudurdinamukhena mahājanena /
T09bsa032_u:2415: icchāmi tena vijaneṣu vaneṣu vastuṃ śraddheyatāmupagato 'smi guṇābhipattau
T09bsa032_u:2417: na hi bhavadvidhānāṃ janapravādasaṃpādanābhirādhyā guṇavibhūtistadasaṃpādanavirādhyā vā
T09bsa032_u:2419: kurvīta yastā hṛdaye 'pi tāvatsyātso 'pahāsyaḥ kimuta prapattā // Jm_20.17
T09bsa032_u:2424: tasyā na hīyeta naraḥ sadharmā hriyāpi tāvaddhuramudvahettām // Jm_20.18
T09bsa032_u:2425: saṃbhāvanāyāṃ guṇabhāvanāyāṃ saṃdṛśyamāno hi yathā tathā vā /
T09bsa032_u:2426: viśeṣato bhāti yaśaḥprasiddhyā syāttvanyathā śuṣka ivodapānaḥ // Jm_20.19
T09bsa032_u:2428: vicūrṇitā kīrtitanurnarāṇāṃ duḥkhena śaknoti punaḥ prasartum // Jm_20.20
T09bsa032_u:2430: krodhocchiraskāniva kṛṣṇasarpānyukto 'si māṃ deva na saṃniṣeddhum //
T09bsa032_u:2431: snehena bhaktijñatayā ca kāmaṃ yukto vidhirbhṛtyajane tavāyam /
T09bsa032_u:2433: vittena tu pravrajitasya kiṃ me parigrahakleśaparigraheṇa // Jm_20.22 //
T09bsa032_u:2434: ityanunīya sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ kṛtābhyanujñastena tata eva vanāya pratasthe /
T09bsa032_u:2435: athainaṃ suhṛdo jñātayaḥ saṃśritāścābhigamya śokāśrupariplutanayanāḥ pādayoḥ saṃpariṣvajya nivārayitumīṣuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2440: / gṛhāśrama eva puṇyatama ityevamanye śrutiyuktisaṃgrathitaṃ grāhayitumīhāṃ cakrire /
T09bsa032_u:2441: tapovanavāsaduḥkhatāsaṃkīrtanaiḥ kāryaśeṣaparisamāptyā yācñayā paralokaphalasaṃdehakathābhistaistaiśca vārttāviśeṣairnivartayitumenaṃ vyāyacchanta /
T09bsa032_u:2442: tasya tān pravrajyāśrayavimukhān vanagamananivāraṇadhīramukhān nayanajalārdramukhān suhṛdo 'bhivīkṣya vyaktamiti cintā babhūva -
T09bsa032_u:2443: suhṛtpratijñaiḥ suhṛdi pramatte nyāyyaṃ hitaṃ rūkṣamapi prayoktum /
T09bsa032_u:2444: rūḍhaḥ satāmeṣa hi dharmamārgaḥ prāgeva rūcyaṃ ca hitaṃ ca yatsyāt //
T09bsa032_u:2445: vanād gṛhaṃ śreya idaṃ tvamīṣāṃ svastheṣu citteṣu kathaṃ nu ruḍham /
T09bsa032_u:2447: mṛto mariṣyannapi vā manuṣyaścyutaśca dharmāditi roditavyam /
T09bsa032_u:2448: kayā nu buddhyā vanavāsakāmaṃ māmeva jīvantamamī rudanti // Jm_20.25 //
T09bsa032_u:2449: madviprayogastvatha śokaheturmayā samaṃ kiṃ na vane vasanti /
T09bsa032_u:2450: gehāni cetkāntatarāṇi mattaḥ ko nvādaro bāṣpaparivyayena // Jm_20.26 //
T09bsa032_u:2451: atha tvidānīṃ svajanānurāgaḥ karoti naiṣāṃ tapase 'bhyanujñām /
T09bsa032_u:2453: sāmarthyamāsītkathamasya naiva byūḍheṣvanīkeṣvapi tatra tatra // Jm_20.27
T09bsa032_u:2456: nivāraṇārthāni sagadgadāni vākyāni sāśrūṇi ca locanāni /
T09bsa032_u:2457: praṇāmalolāni śirāṃsi caiṣāṃ mānaṃ samānasya yathā karoti // Jm_20.29 //
T09bsa032_u:2459: mā bhūnnaṭānāmiva vṛttametad vrīḍākaraṃ sajjanamānasānām // Jm_20.30 //
T09bsa032_u:2462: ye me haranti sma puraḥsaratvaṃ raṇeṣu mattadvipasaṃkaṭeṣu /
T09bsa032_u:2463: nānuvrajantyadya vanāya te māṃ kiṃsvitsa evāsmi ta eva ceme // Jm_20.32 //
T09bsa032_u:2464: smarāmi naiṣāṃ viguṇaṃ prayātuṃ snehasya yatsaṃkṣayakāraṇaṃ syāt /
T09bsa032_u:2466: mamaiva vā nirguṃṇabhāva eṣa nānuvrajantyadya vanāya yanmām /
T09bsa032_u:2467: guṇāvabaddhāni hi mānasāni kasyāsti viśleṣayituṃ prabhutvam // Jm_20.34 //
T09bsa032_u:2469: ye vā prakāśānapi gehadoṣānguṇānna paśyanti tapovane vā /
T09bsa032_u:2471: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetūnkāmānvihātuṃ na samutsahante /
T09bsa032_u:2472: tapovanaṃ tadviparītamete tyajanti māṃ cādya dhigastu moham // Jm_20.36 //
T09bsa032_u:2473: yairvipralabdhāḥ suhṛdo mamaite na yānti śāntiṃ nikhilāśca lokāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2475: iti sa parigaṇayya niścitātmā praṇayamayāni suhṛdviceṣṭitāni /
T09bsa032_u:2477: tadevamabhūtaguṇasaṃbhāvanā pratodasaṃcodaneva bhavati sādhūnāmiti guṇasaṃpādane prayatitavyam
T09bsa032_u:2478: yato bhikṣurityupāsaka iti guṇataḥ saṃbhāvyamānena sādhunā tadbhāvasādhubhirguṇairabhyalaṃkartavya evātmā /
T09bsa032_u:2485: bodhisattvaḥ kila mahāsattvaḥ kasmiṃścinmahati brāhmaṇakule guṇābhyāsamāhātmyādativṛddhayaśasi pratiniyatasamṛddhiguṇe rājasatkṛte daivatasaṃmate lokasya janma pratileme /
T09bsa032_u:2486: kālānāmatyayenābhivṛddhaḥ kṛtasaṃskārakarmā śrutaguṇābhyāsādacireṇaiva vidvatsadassu prakāśanāmā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2489: atha sa mahātmā pravrajyākṛtaparicayatvātpūrvajanmasu svabhyastadharmasaṃjñatvātprajñāvadātamatitvacca na gehe ratimupalebhe /
T09bsa032_u:2490: sa kāmān vigrahavivādamadavairasyaprācuryādrājacaurodakadahanavipriyadāyādasādhāraṇatvādatṛptijanakatvādanekadoṣāyatanatvācca saviṣamivānnamātmakāmaḥ parityajya saṃhṛtakeśaśmaśruśobhaḥ kāṣāyavivarṇavāsāḥ parityaktagṛhaveṣavibhramaḥ pravrajyāvinayaniyamaśriyamaśiśriyam /
T09bsa032_u:2492: atha bodhisattvastapovanānugamanavyavasāyamasya vidtvā tapovanādhyāsanāyogyatāṃ ca strīsaukumāryasyāvocadenāṃ - bhadre darśitastvayāyamasmadanurāgasvabhāvaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2494: yatraiva tvanyāḥ pravrajitāḥ prativasanti tatra bhavatyāstābhireva sārdha pratirūpaṃ vastuṃ syāt /
T09bsa032_u:2498: niketahīnā yatayo vasanti yatraiva cāstaṃ ravirabhyupaiti // Jm_21.2 //
T09bsa032_u:2500: nivartituṃ tena matiṃ kuruṣva ko 'rthastabānena paribhrameṇa // Jm_21.3 //
T09bsa032_u:2503: kimityevaṃ prapadyeya duḥkha tava ca vipriyam // Jm_21.4 //
T09bsa032_u:2505: yattu naiva samarthāsmi vartituṃ rahitā tvayā /
T09bsa032_u:2507: iti sā dvitrirapyucyamānāyadā necchati sma nivartitum, tato bodhisattva upekṣānibhṛtamatirasyāṃ babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2508: sa tayānugamyamānaścakravāka iva cakravākyā grāmanagaranigamānanuvicaran kadācitkṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ kasmiṃścitpravivikte śrimati nānātarugahanopaśobhite ghanapracchāye kṛtopakāra iva kvacitkvaciddinakarakiraṇacandrakairnānukusumarajo 'vakīrṇadharaṇitale
T09bsa032_u:2509: śucau vanoddeśe dhyānavidhimanuṣṭhāya sāyānhasamaye vyutthāya samādheḥ pāṃsukūlāni sivyati sma /
T09bsa032_u:2510: sāpi pravrajitā tasyaiva nātīdūre vṛkṣamūlamupaśobhayamānā devateva svena vapuṣaḥ prabhāveṇa virājamānā tadupadiṣṭena manaskāravidhinā dhyāyati sma /
T09bsa032_u:2511: atha tatratyo rājā vasantakālajanitābhyadhikakisalayaśobhāni bhramadbhramaramadhukarīgaṇopakūjitāni pramattakokilakulakilakilāni prahasitakamalakuvalayālaṃkṛtābhilaṣaṇiyajalāśayāni vividhakusumasaṃmodagandhādhivāsitasukhapavanānyupavanāni samanuvicaraṃstaṃ deśamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:2515: ākrīḍabhūtāni manobhavasya draṣṭuṃ bhavatyeva manaḥpraharṣaḥ // Jm_21.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2516: atha sa rājā savinayamabhigamya bodhisattvaṃ kṛtapratisaṃmodanakathastatraikānte nvaṣidata
T09bsa032_u:2517: sa tāṃ pravrajitāmatimanoharadarśanāmabhivīkṣya tasyā rūpaśobhayā samākṣipyamāgahṛdayo nūnamasyeyaṃ sahadharmacāriṇītyavetya lolasvabhavatvāttadapaharaṇopāyaṃ vimamarśa /
T09bsa032_u:2520: tasya buddhirabhavat - tapaḥprabhāvamasya jñātvā śakyamatra tadyuktaṃ pravartituṃ nānyathā
T09bsa032_u:2524: iti vicintya sa rājā tapahprabhāvajijñāsayā bodhisattvaṃ hitaiṣivaduvāca - bhoḥ pravrajita pracuradhūrtasāhasikapuruṣe 'smiṃlloke na yuktamatrabhavato nirākrandeṣu
T09bsa032_u:2527: paśya evaṃ vivikteṣu tapaḥkṛśaṃ tvāṃ dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ paribhūya kaścit /
T09bsa032_u:2528: imāṃ prasahyāpaharedyadā te śokātparaṃ kiṃ bata tatra kuryāḥ // Jm_21.9 //
T09bsa032_u:2530: vasatviyaṃ tena janānta eva strīsaṃnikarṣeṇa ca kiṃ yatīnām // Jm_21.10 //
T09bsa032_u:2534: syādatra me yaḥ pratikūlavartī darpodbhavādapratisaṃkhyayā vā /
T09bsa032_u:2535: vyaktaṃ na mucyeta sa jīvato me dhārādhanasyeva dhanasya reṇuḥ // Jm_21.11
T09bsa032_u:2536: atha sa rājā tīvrāpekṣo 'yamasyāṃ tapaḥprabhāvahīna ityavajñāya taṃ
T09bsa032_u:2537: mahāsattvaṃ tadapāyanirāśaṅkaḥ kāmarāgavaśagaḥ strīsaṃdarśanādhikṛtān puruṣān samādideśa - gacchataitāṃ pravrajitāmantaḥpuraṃ praveśayateti /
T09bsa032_u:2538: tadupaśrutya sā pravrajitā vyālamṛgābhidruteva vanamṛgī bhayaviṣādaviklavamukhī bāṣpoparudhyamānanayanā gadgadāyamānakaṇṭhī tattadārtivaśādvilalāpa -
T09bsa032_u:2540: sa eva yasya tvanayābahuḥ syādākrandanaṃ kasya nu tena kāryam // Jm_21.12
T09bsa032_u:2541: bhraṣṭādhikārā bata lokapālā na santi vā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatā vā /
T09bsa032_u:2542: na trātumārtāniti ye sayatnā dharmo 'pi manye śrutimātrameva // Jm_21.13
T09bsa032_u:2544: kiṃ vā surairme bhagavān yadevaṃ madbhāgadheyairdhṛtamauna eva /
T09bsa032_u:2547: itthaṃgatāyāmapi tasya maunaṃ tathāpi jīvāmi ca mandabhāgyā // Jm_21.15 //
T09bsa032_u:2549: ārteṣu kārūṇyamayī pravṛttistapodhanānāṃ kimayaṃ na mārgaḥ // Jm_21.16 //
T09bsa032_u:2550: śaṅke tavādyāpi tadeva citte nivartyamānāsmi na yannivṛttā /
T09bsa032_u:2551: tavāpriyeṇāpi mayepsitaṃ yadātmapriyaṃhā tadidaṃ kathaṃ me // Jm_21.17 //
T09bsa032_u:2552: iti tāṃ pravrajitā karunavilāpākranditaruditamātraparāyaṇāṃ te rājasamādiṣṭāḥ puruṣā yānamāropya paśyata eva tasya mahasattvasyāntaḥpurāya ninyuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2554: pratisaṃkhyānabalātpratinudya krodhabalaṃ tathaiba pāṃsukūlāni niḥsaṃkṣobhaḥ praśāntacetāḥ sīvyati sma /
T09bsa032_u:2558: taddarśaya svāṃ bhujayo ruṣaṃ vā tejastapaḥsaṃśrayasaṃbhṛtaṃ vā /
T09bsa032_u:2559: ātmapramāṇagrahaṇānabhijño vyarthapratijño hyadhikaṃ na bhāti // Jm_21.19
T09bsa032_u:2560: bodhisattva uvāca - avyarthapratijñameva māṃ viddhi mahārāja /
T09bsa032_u:2562: yo 'bhūnmamātra pratikūlavartī vispandamāno 'pi sa me na muktaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2563: prasahya nītaḥ praśamaṃ mayā tu tasmādyathārthaiva mama pratijñā //
T09bsa032_u:2564: atha sa rājā tena bodhisattvasya dhairyātiśayavyañjakena praśamena samutpāditatapasviguṇasaṃbhāvanaścintāmāpede - anyadevānena brāhmaṇenābhisaṃdhāya bhāṣitam, tadaparijñāyāsmābhiścāpalakṛtamidamiti jātapratyavamarśo bodhisattvamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2565: ko 'nyastavābhūtpratikūlavartī yo visphuranneva na te vimuktaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2566: reṇuḥ samudyanniva toyadena kaścopanītaḥ praśamaṃ tvayātra // Jm_21.21 //
T09bsa032_u:2568: śṛṇu mahārāja jāte na dṛśyate yasminnajāte sādhu dṛśyate /
T09bsa032_u:2569: abhūnme sa na muktaśca krodhaḥ svāśrayabādhanaḥ // Jm_21.22 //
T09bsa032_u:2571: so 'bhūnme na vimuktaśca krodhaḥ śātravanandanaḥ // Jm_21.23 //
T09bsa032_u:2574: yenābhibhūtaḥ kuśalaṃ jahāti prāptādapi bhraśyata eva cārthāt /
T09bsa032_u:2578: dahanamiva vijṛmbhamāṇaraudraṃ śamayati yo hṛdayajvaraṃ na roṣam /
T09bsa032_u:2579: laghurayamiti hīyate 'sya kīrtiḥ kumudasakhīva śaśiprabhā prabhāte //
T09bsa032_u:2582: vikasati niyamena tasya kīrtiḥ śaśina ivābhinavasya maṇḍalaśrīḥ //
T09bsa032_u:2585: saroṣaśalye hṛdaye ca duḥkhaṃ mahārhaśayyāṅkagato 'pi śete // Jm_21.29 //
T09bsa032_u:2591: ataḥ paraṃ kiṃ ripavaśca kuryustīvrāpakāroddhatamanyavo 'pi // Jm_21.32 //
T09bsa032_u:2594: ato na muktaḥ kopo me visphurannapi cetasi /
T09bsa032_u:2596: atha sa rājā tena tasyādbhutena praśamaguṇena hṛdayagrāhakeṇa ca vacasābhiprasāditamatiruvāca
T09bsa032_u:2601: tāṃ ca pravrajitāṃ kṣamayitvā vyavasarjayat, paricāraka cātmānaṃ bodhisattvasya niryātayāmāsa
T09bsa032_u:2602: tadevaṃ krodhavinayācchatrūnupaśamayati, vardhayatyeva tvanyathā, iti krodhavinaye yatnaḥ kāryaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2603: evamavaireṇa vairāṇi śāmyanti, saṃyamataśca vairaṃ na cīyate /
T09bsa032_u:2604: evaṃ cobhayorarthaṃ caratyakrodhana ityevamādiṣu kṣamānuśaṃsāpratisaṃyukteṣu sūtreṣu vācyam
T09bsa032_u:2608: 22. Haṃsajātakam vinipātagatānāmapi satāṃ vṛttaṃ nālamanugantumasatpuruṣāḥ, prāgeva sugatisthānām
T09bsa032_u:2610: bodhisattvaḥ kila mānase mahāsarasi naikaśatasahasrasaṃkhyasya mahato haṃsayūyasyādhipatirdhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsarājo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2611: tasya nayānayaparijñānanipuṇamatirviprakṛṣṭagocarasmṛtiprabhāvaḥ ślāghanīyakulatilakabhūto dākṣyadākṣiṇyavinayabhūṣaṇaḥ sthiraśuciśīlavṛttacāritraśūraḥ khedasahiṣṇurapramādī samaravīvadhaviśāradaḥ svāmyanurāgasumukhaḥ sumukho nāma senāpatirbabhūva [āryānandasthavirastena samayena] /
T09bsa032_u:2612: tau parasparapremaguṇāśrayājjvalitataraprabhāvāvāryaśiṣyamukhyāviva pariśeṣaṃ śiṣyagaṇaṃ pitṛjyeṣṭhaputrāviva ca śreṣṭhaśeṣaṃ putragaṇaṃ taddhaṃsayūthamubhayalokahitodayeṣvartheṣu samyagniveśayamānau tatpratyakṣiṇāṃ devanāgayakṣavidyādharatapasvināṃ paraṃ
T09bsa032_u:2616: evaṃ tābhyāṃ tadanugṛhyamāṇaṃ haṃsayūthaṃ jagadivaṃ dharmārthavistarābhyāṃ parāṃ vṛddhimavāpa
T09bsa032_u:2617: tena ca tatsaraḥ parāṃ śobhāṃ babhāra /
T09bsa032_u:2622: atha tasya haṃsādhipateḥ sarvasattvahitasumukhasya ca senāpaterguṇātiśayaprabhāvavismitamanasaḥ siddharṣividyādharadaivatagaṇāstayoḥ kīrtyāśrayābhiḥ kathābhistatra tatrābhiremire /
T09bsa032_u:2624: dharmābhijāto vinayo nayaśca kāvapyamū kevalahaṃsaveṣau // Jm_22.4 //
T09bsa032_u:2628: tena ca samayena brahmadatto nāmānyatamo vārāṇasyāṃ rājā babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2629: sa tāṃ haṃsādhipateḥ sasenādhipaterguṇātiśayāśrayāṃ kathāṃ prātyayikāmātyadvijavṛddhaiḥ sadasi saṃstūyamānāmasakṛdupaśrutya tayordarśanaṃ pratyabhivṛddhakautūhalo naikaśāstrābhyāsanipuṇamatīn sacivānuvāca - parimṛśyatāṃ tāvadbhoḥ prasṛtanipuṇamatayaḥ kaścidupāyo yena nāstau haṃsavaryau darśanapathamapi tāvadupagacchetāmiti /
T09bsa032_u:2630: atha te 'mātyāḥ svaiḥ svairmatiprabhāvairanusṛtya nītipathaṃ rājānamūcuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:2633: tadyādṛśe sarabhi tāvabhiratarūpāvanuśrūyete tadutkṛṣṭaraguṇaśobhamiha saraḥ kasmiṃścidaraṇyapradeśe kārayitumarhati devaḥ, pratyahaṃ ca sarvapakṣiṇāmabhayapradānaghoṣaṇām /
T09bsa032_u:2636: prāyeṇa prāptivirasaṃ sukhaṃ deva na gaṇyate /
T09bsa032_u:2637: parokṣatvāttu harati śrutiramyaṃ sukhaṃ manaḥ // Jm_22.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2638: atha sa rājā astvetadityalpena kālena nātisaṃnikṛṣṭaṃ nagaropavanasya mānasasarasaḥ pratispardhiguṇavibhavaṃ padmotpalakumudapuṇḍarīkasaugandhikatāmarasakalhārasamūpagūḍhaṃ vimalasalilamatimanoharaṃ mahatsaraḥ kārayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:2655: rajobhiḥ kusumānāṃ ca savāsamiva kutracit // Jm_22.15 //
T09bsa032_u:2658: tadevaṃvidhaṃ saraḥ kārayitvā sarvapakṣigaṇasya cānāvṛtasukhopabhogyametaddattvā pratyahaṃ sarvapakṣiṇā viśvāsanārthamityabhayadānaghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:2660: dadāti rājā pakṣibhyaḥ prītyā sābhayadakṣiṇam // Jm_22.17 //
T09bsa032_u:2661: atha kadācitsaṃhṛtameghāndhakārayavanikāsu śaradguṇopahṛdaśobhāsvālokanakṣamāsu dikṣu prabaddhakamalavanaśobheṣu prasannasalilamanohareṣu sarassu paraṃ kāntiyauvanamupagate praceyakiraṇa iva candramasi vividhasasyasaṃpadvibhūṣaṇadharāyāṃ vasuṃdharāyāṃ pravṛtte haṃsataruṇajanasaṃpāte mānasātsarasaḥ śaratprasannāni
T09bsa032_u:2662: digantarāṇyanuvicaradanupūrveṇānyatamaṃ haṃsamithunaṃ tasmādeva haṃsayūthāttasya rājño viṣayamupajagāma
T09bsa032_u:2663: tatra ca pakṣigaṇakolāhalonnāditamanibhṛtamadhukaragaṇaṃ taraṃgamālāvicaraṇakṛtavyāpāraiḥ sukhaśiśirairmṛdubhiranilaiḥ samantato vikṣiptamāṇakamalakuvalayareṇugandhaṃ jvaladiva vikacaiḥ kamalairhasadiva vikasitaiḥ kumudaistatsaro dadarśa /
T09bsa032_u:2664: tasya mānasasaraḥsamucitasyāpi haṃsamithunasya tāmatimanoharāṃ sarasaḥ śriyamabhivīkṣya prādurabhūt - aho bata tadapi haṃsayūthamihāgacchediti /
T09bsa032_u:2665: prāyeṇa khalu lokasya prāpya sādhāraṇaṃ sukham /
T09bsa032_u:2667: atha tatra taddhaṃsamithunaṃ yathākāmaṃ vihṛtya pravṛtte jaladasamaye vidyudvisphuritaśastravikṣepeṣu nātighanavicchinnāndhakārarūpeṣu samabhivartamāneṣu daityānīkeṣviva jaladharavṛndeṣu paripūrṇabarhakalāpaśobheṣu prasaktakekāninādotkruṣṭairjaladharavijayamiva saṃrādhayatsu nṛttapravṛtteṣu citreṣu barhigaṇeṣu vācālatāmupagateṣu stokaśukaniṣu pravicaratsu kadambasarjārjunaketakīpuṣpagandhādhivāsiteṣu
T09bsa032_u:2668: sukhaśiśireṣu kānanaviniścasiteṣvivānileṣu meghadaśanapaṃktiṣvivālakṣyamāṇarūpāsu balākāyuvatiṣu gamanautsukyamṛdunikūjiteṣu prayāṇavyākuleṣu haṃsayūtheṣu
T09bsa032_u:2670: samupetya ca haṃsādhipatisamīpaṃ prastutāsu digdeśakathāsu taṃ tasya saraso guṇaviśeṣaṃ varṇayāmāsa - asti deva dakṣiṇena himavato vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma narādhipatiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2673: ramante cātra pakṣiṇaḥ svagṛha iva prahīnabhayāśaṅkā /
T09bsa032_u:2674: tadarhati devo vyatītāsu varṣāsu tatra gantumiti /
T09bsa032_u:2675: tacchrutvā sarva eva te haṃsāstatsaṃdarśanasamutsukā babhūvuḥ
T09bsa032_u:2676: atha bhodhisattvaḥ sumukhaṃ senāpatiṃ praśanavyaktākāraṃ pratataṃ dadarśa,
T09bsa032_u:2678: atha sumukhaḥ praṇamyainamuvāca - na prāptaṃ tatra devasya gamanamiti paśyāmi /
T09bsa032_u:2686: vaṇijo 'pi hi kurvanti lābhasiddhyāśayā vyayam // Jm_22.20 //
T09bsa032_u:2687: yato naitāvatā deva visrambhaḥ kṣamate kvacit /
T09bsa032_u:2688: kāryārthamapi na śreyaḥ sātyayāpanayaḥ kramaḥ // Jm_22.21 //
T09bsa032_u:2689: yadi tvavaśyameva tatra gantavyam, gatvānubhūya ca tasya saraso guṇavibhūtirasaṃ na nastatra ciraṃ vicarituṃ kṣamaṃ nivāsāya vā
T09bsa032_u:2691: atha bodhisattvaḥ prāptāyāṃ vimalacandrakṣatratārāvibhūṣaṇāyāṃ rajanyāṃ śaradi tena haṃsayūthena vārāṇasīsaraḥsaṃdarśanaṃ pratyabhivṛddhakautūhalena tadabhigamanārthaṃ punaḥ punarvijñāpyamānasteṣāṃ haṃsānāmanuvṛttyā sumukhapramukheṇa mahatā haṃsagaṇena parivṛttaścandramā iva śaradabhṛvṛdena tatrābhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:2692: dṛṣṭvaiva lakṣmī sarasastu tasya teṣāṃ praharṣākulavismayānām /
T09bsa032_u:2695: ataściraṃ tadgatamānasānāṃ na mānase mānasamāsa teṣām // Jm_22.23 //
T09bsa032_u:2696: tatra te tāmabhayaghoṣaṇāmupalabhya svacchandatāṃ ca pakṣigaṇasya tasya ca saraso vibhūtsā pramuditahṛdayāstatrodyānayātrāmivānubhavantaḥ parāṃ prītisaṃpadamupajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2697: atha tasmin sarasyadhikṛtāḥ puruṣāsteṣāṃ haṃsānāṃ tatrāgamanaṃ rājñe pratyavedayanta - yādṛśaguṇarūpau (Vaidya 139) deva tau haṃsavaryāvanuśrūyete tadṛśāveva [haṃsavaryau]kanakāvadātarucirapatrau
T09bsa032_u:2699: atha sa rājā śākunikakarmaṇi prasiddhaprakāśanaipuṇaṃ śākunikagaṇe samanvipya tadgrahaṇārthaṃ sādaramanvādideśa /
T09bsa032_u:2700: sa tatheti pratiśrutya taryorhaṃsayorgocaravihārapradeśaṃ samyagupalabhya tatra tatra dṛḍhānnigūḍhān pāśān nyadadhāt /
T09bsa032_u:2701: atha teṣāṃ haṃsānāṃ viśvāsādapāyanirāśaṅkānāṃ pramododdhatamanasāṃ vicaratāṃ sa haṃsādhipatiḥ pāśena caraṇe nyabadhyata /
T09bsa032_u:2704: atha bodhisattvo mā bhūdanyasyāpi kasyacittatraivaṃvidho vyasanopanipāta iti rutaviśeṣeṇa sapratibhayatāṃ sarasaḥ prakāśayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:2706: haṃsādhipatibandhādvyathitahṛdayā bhayavirasavyākulavirāvāḥ parasparanirapekṣā hatapravīrā iva sainikā divaṃ samutpetuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2708: snehāvabaddhāni hi mānasāni prāṇatyayaṃ svaṃ na vicintayanti /
T09bsa032_u:2709: prāṇātyayād duḥkhataraṃ yadeṣāṃ suhṛjjanasya vyasanārtidainyam // Jm_22.25
T09bsa032_u:2711: gaccha gacchaiva sumukha kṣamaṃ neha vilambitum /
T09bsa032_u:2714: naikāntiko mṛtyuriha sthitasya na gacchataḥ syādajarāmaratvam /
T09bsa032_u:2715: sukheṣu ca tvāṃ samupāsya nityamāpadgataṃ mānada kena jahyām // Jm_22.27
T09bsa032_u:2718: naiṣa dharmo mahārāja tyajeyaṃ tvāṃ yadāpadi /
T09bsa032_u:2719: yā gatistava sā mahyaṃ rocate vihagādhipa // Jm_22.29 //
T09bsa032_u:2722: kā nu pāśena baddhasya gatiranyā mahānasāt /
T09bsa032_u:2723: sā kathaṃ svasthacittasya muktasyābhimatā tava // Jm_22.30 //
T09bsa032_u:2724: paśyasyevaṃ kamarthaṃ vā tvaṃ mamātmana eva vā /
T09bsa032_u:2727: tādṛśe saṃtyajan prāṇān kamarthaṃ dyotayedbhavān // Jm_22.32 //
T09bsa032_u:2729: kathaṃ nu patatāṃ śreṣṭha dharme 'rthaṃ na samīkṣase /
T09bsa032_u:2731: so 'haṃ dharmaṃ ca saṃpaśyan dharmāccārthaṃ samutthitam /
T09bsa032_u:2732: tava mānada bhaktyā ca nābhikāṅkṣāmi jīvitam // Jm_22.34 //
T09bsa032_u:2738: api caivaṃgate kārye yadūnaṃ suhṛdāṃ mayā /
T09bsa032_u:2742: atha tau haṃsavaryau niṣādamāpatantamālokya tūṣṇīṃ babhūvatuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2743: sa ca taddhaṃsayūthaṃ vidrutamālokya nūnamatra kaścidvaddha iti niścitamatiḥ pāśasthānānyanuvicaraṃstau haṃsavaryau dadarśa /
T09bsa032_u:2744: sa tadrūpaśobhayā vismitamanā baddhāviti manyamānastatsamāpannau pāśāvudghaṭṭayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:2749: kasmātprāpte 'pi mayyevaṃ vegānna bhajase nabhaḥ // Jm_22.40 //
T09bsa032_u:2751: tadupaśrutya sumukhaḥ pravyaktākṣarapadavinyāsena svabhāvavarṇanādhairyaguṇaujasvinā svareṇa mānuṣīṃ vācamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2752: śaktisthaḥ sanna gacchāmi yadidaṃ tatra kāraṇam /
T09bsa032_u:2756: atha sa naiṣādaḥ paramavismitamatiḥ saṃhṛṣitatanūruhaḥ sumukhaṃ punaruvāca
T09bsa032_u:2758: tvaṃ punarna tyajasyenaṃ ko nvayaṃ bhavato dvija // Jm_22.43 //
T09bsa032_u:2760: rājā mama prāṇasamaḥ sakhā ca sukhasya dātā viṣamasthitaśca /
T09bsa032_u:2762: atha sumukhaḥ prasādavismayāvarjitamānasaṃ taṃ naiṣādamavetya punaruvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2766: naiva te duḥkhamicchāmi na ca baddho bhavān mayā /
T09bsa032_u:2767: sa tvaṃ gaccha yathākāmaṃ paśya bandhūṃśca nandaya // Jm_22.46 //
T09bsa032_u:2769: no cedicchasi me duḥkhaṃ tatkuruṣva mamārthanām /
T09bsa032_u:2770: ekena yadi tuṣṭo 'si tattyajainaṃ gṛhāṇaṃ mām // Jm_22.47 //
T09bsa032_u:2772: viddhi niṣkraya ityasya na te 'haṃ lābhahānaye // Jm_22.48 //
T09bsa032_u:2774: māṃ badhnātu bhavān pūrvaṃ paścānmuñceda dvijādhipam // Jm_22.49 //
T09bsa032_u:2775: tāvāneva ca lābhaste kṛtā syānmama cārthanā /
T09bsa032_u:2776: haṃsayūthasya ca prītirmaitrī tena tathaiva ca // Jm_22.50 //
T09bsa032_u:2778: paśyantu tāvadbhavatā vimuktaṃ haṃsādhipaṃ haṃsagaṇāḥ pratītāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2780: atha sa naiṣādaḥ krūratābhyasakaṭhinahṛdayo 'pi tena tasya jīvitanirapekṣeṇa svāmyanurāgaślāghinā
T09bsa032_u:2781: dhairyamādhuryālaṃkṛtavacasā samāvarjitahṛdayo vismayagauravavaśāṭsamānītāñjaliḥ sumukhamuvāsa - sādhu sādhu mahābhāga
T09bsa032_u:2785: ko hi prāṇāpriyatare tavāsmin vipriyaṃ carat // Jm_22.53 //
T09bsa032_u:2786: ityuktvā sa naiṣādastasya nṛapteḥ saṃdeśamanādṛtya haṃsarājaṃ samanumānayan dayāsumukhaṃ pāśānmumoca
T09bsa032_u:2789: evaṃ suhṛjjñātigaṇena bhadra śaratsahastrāṇi bahūni nanda // Jm_22.54 //
T09bsa032_u:2790: tanmā tavāyaṃ viphalaḥ śramo bhūdādāya māṃ haṃsagaṇādhipaṃ ca /
T09bsa032_u:2792: asaṃśayaṃ prītamanāḥ sa rājā haṃsāvipaṃ sānucaraṃ samīkṣya /
T09bsa032_u:2794: atha naiṣādastasya nirbandhāt paśyatu tāvadatyadbhutamidaṃ haṃsayutaṃ sa rājeti kṛtvā te haṃsamukhyau kācenādaya svasthāvabaddhau rājñe darśayāmāsa
T09bsa032_u:2798: atha sa rājā praharṣavismayāpūrṇamatirdṛṣṭvā tī haṃsapradhānī kāñcanapuñjāvivaśriyābhijvalanmanohararūpau taṃ naiṣādamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2800: tava hastamanuprāptau kathaṃ kathaya vistaram // Jm_22.58 //
T09bsa032_u:2807: ātmānaṃ tiṣkrayaṃ kṛtvā haṃsarājasya jīvitam // Jm_22.61 //
T09bsa032_u:2810: tenāsya vākyena supeśalena svāmyarthadhīreṇa ca ceṣṭitena /
T09bsa032_u:2811: tathā prasanno 'smi yathāsya bhartā mayā samaṃ krūratayaiva muktaḥ //
T09bsa032_u:2813: tvadabhiṃgama iti nyayojayanmāṃ viphalaguruḥ kila mā mama śramo bhūt //
T09bsa032_u:2815: mamāpi hṛdi mārdavaṃ janitavān kṣaṇenaiva yaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2816: khagādhipatimokṣaṇaṃ kṛtamanusmaran matkṛte sahādhipatināgataḥ svayamayaṃ ca te 'ntaḥpuram tadupaśrutya sa rājā sapramodavismayena manasā vividharatnaprabhodbhāsurasurucirapādaṃ parārdhyāstaraṇaracanābhirāmaṃ śrimatsukhopāśrayasāṭopamupahitapādapīṭhaṃ rājādhyāsanayogyaṃ kāñcanamāsanaṃ haṃsarājāya samādideśaḥ, amātyamukhyādhyāsanayogyaṃ ca vetrāsanaṃ sumukhāya /
T09bsa032_u:2818: atha bodhisattvaḥ kāla idānīṃ pratisaṃmoditumiti nūpurārāvamadhureṇa svareṇa rājānamābabhāṣe
T09bsa032_u:2819: dyutikāntiniketane śarīre kuśalaṃ te kuśalārha kaccidasmin /
T09bsa032_u:2820: api dharmaśarīramavraṇaṃ te vipulairucchvasitīva vākpradānaiḥ // Jm_22.66
T09bsa032_u:2822: abhivardhayase svakīrtiśobhamanurāgaṃ jagato hitodayaṃ ca // Jm_22.67 //
T09bsa032_u:2824: samavekṣayase hitaṃ prajānāṃ na ca tatrāsi parokṣabuddhireva // Jm_22.68
T09bsa032_u:2826: upayāsi dayānuvṛttiśobhāṃ na ca viśvāsamayīṃ pramādanidrām // Jm_22.69 //
T09bsa032_u:2828: vitatā iva dikṣu kīrtisiddhyā ripubhirniśvasitairasatkriyante // Jm_22.70
T09bsa032_u:2830: adya me kuśalaṃ haṃsa sarvatra ca bhaviṣyati /
T09bsa032_u:2850: ubhayeṣāṃ priyaṃ kṛtvā mahadarhatyayaṃ priyam // Jm_22.79 //
T09bsa032_u:2851: ityuktvā sa rājā taṃ naiṣādaṃ mahatā dhanavistarapradānena samānya punarhaṃsarājamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2852: imaṃ svamāvāsamupāgatau yuvāṃ visṛjyatāṃ tanmayi yantraṇāvratam /
T09bsa032_u:2853: prayojanaṃ yena yathā taducyatāṃ bhavatsahāyā hi vibhūtayo mama //
T09bsa032_u:2854: aśaṅkitoktaiḥ praṇayākṣaraiḥ suhṛt karoti tuṣṭiṃ vibhavasthitasya yām /
T09bsa032_u:2855: na tadvidhāṃ lambhayate sa tāṃ dhanairmahopakāraḥ praṇayaḥ suhṛtsvataḥ //
T09bsa032_u:2856: atha sa rājā sumukhasaṃbhāṣaṇakutūhalahṛdayaḥ savismayabhivīkṣya sumukhamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2857: alabdhagādhā navasaṃstave jane na yānti kāmaṃ praṇayapragalbhatām /
T09bsa032_u:2858: vacastu dākṣiṇyasamāhitākṣaraṃ na te na jalpantyupacāraśībharam //
T09bsa032_u:2865: saṃbhāṣamāṇe tu narādhipe ca sauhārdaramyaṃ vihagādhipe ca /
T09bsa032_u:2867: na heyṣa mārgo vinayabhijātastaṃ caiva jānan kathamabhyupeyām /
T09bsa032_u:2868: tūṣṇīṃ mahārāja yataḥ sthito 'haṃ tanmarṣaṇīyaṃ yadi marṣaṇīyam //
T09bsa032_u:2869: ityukte sa rājā sapraharṣavismayavadanaḥ saṃrādhayan sumukhamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2870: sthāne bhavadguṇakathā ramayanti lokaṃ sthāne 'si haṃsapatinā gamitaḥ sakhitvam /
T09bsa032_u:2871: evaṃvidhaṃ hi vinayaṃ nayasauṣṭhavaṃ ca naivākṛtātmahṛdayāni samudvahanti // Jm_22.87 //
T09bsa032_u:2872: tadiyaṃ prastutā prītirvicchidyeta yathā na naḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2873: tathaiva mayi visrambha ajaryaṃ hyāryasaṃgatam // Jm_22.88 //
T09bsa032_u:2874: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñaḥ parāṃ prītikāmatāmavetya snehapravṛttisumukhatāṃ ca saṃrādhayannavocadenam
T09bsa032_u:2879: prayojanaṃ nāma kiyatkimeva vā madāśrayaṃ mānada yattvamīkṣase /
T09bsa032_u:2882: na citrametattvayi vā jitātmani prajāhitārthaṃ dhṛtapārthivavrate /
T09bsa032_u:2883: tapaḥsamādhānapare munāviva svabhāvavṛttyā hi guṇāstvayi sthitāḥ //
T09bsa032_u:2884: iti praśaṃsāsubhagāḥ sukhā guṇā na doṣadurgeṣu vasanti bhūtayaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2885: imāṃ viditvā guṇadoṣadharmatāṃ sacetanaḥ kaḥ svahitotpathaṃ bhacet //
T09bsa032_u:2886: na deśamāpnoti parākrameṇa taṃ na kośavīryeṇa na nitīsaṃpadā /
T09bsa032_u:2888: surādhipaśrīrapi vīkṣate guṇān guṇoditāneva paraiti saṃnati /
T09bsa032_u:2889: guṇebhya eva prabhavanti kīrtayaḥ prabhāvamāhātmyamiti śritaṃ guṇān //
T09bsa032_u:2891: prasādayantyeva manāṃsi vidviṣāṃ śaśiprakāśādhikakāntayo guṇāḥ // Jm_22.96
T09bsa032_u:2894: prajāhitaṃ kṛtyatamaṃ mahīpatestadanya panthā hyubhayatra bhūtaye /
T09bsa032_u:2895: bhavecca tadrājani dharmavatsale nṛpasya vṛttaṃ hi jano 'nuvartate //
T09bsa032_u:2897: praśādhi dharmeṇa vasuṃdharāmataḥ karotu rakṣāṃ tridaśādhipaśca te /
T09bsa032_u:2899: atha sa rājā samabhinandya tattasya vacanaṃ saparṣatkaḥ saṃmānapriyavacanaprayogapuraḥsaraṃ tau haṃsamukhyau visasarja /
T09bsa032_u:2900: atha bodhisattvaḥ samutpatya vimalakhaḍgābhinīlaṃ śaratprasannaśobhaṃ gaganatalaṃ pratibimbenevānugamyamānaḥ sumukhena haṃsasenāpatinā samupetya haṃsayūthaṃ saṃdarśanādeva pareṇa praharṣeṇa saṃyojayāmāsa kālena copetya nṛpaṃ sa haṃsaḥ parānukampavyasanī sahaṃsaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2901: jagāda dharmaṃ kṣitipena tena pratyarcyamāno vinayānatena // Jm_22.100 //
T09bsa032_u:2902: tadevaṃ vinipātagatānāmapi satāṃ vṛttaṃ nālamanugantumasatpuruṣāḥ prāgeva sugatiṣṭhānāmiti
T09bsa032_u:2904: kalyāṇamitravarṇe 'pi vācyam, evaṃ kalyāṇamitravatāṃ kṛcchre 'pyarthāḥ saṃsidhyantīti /
T09bsa032_u:2905: sthavirāryānandapūrvasabhāgapradarśane ca, evamayaṃ sthaviraḥ sahacaritacaraṇo bodhisattvena cirakālābhyastapremabahumāno bhavatīti /
T09bsa032_u:2908: 23. Mahābodhijātakam asatkṛtānāmapi satpuruṣāṇāṃ pūrvopakāriṣvanukampā na śithilībhavati
T09bsa032_u:2911: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān mahābodhirnāma parivrājako babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2912: sa gṛhasthabhāva eva parividitakramavyāyāmo lokābhimatānāṃ vidyāsthānānāṃ kṛtajñānakautūhalaścitrāsu ca kalāsu pravrajyāśrayāllokahitodyogācca viśeṣavattaraṃ dharmaśāstreṣvavahitamatisteṣvācāryakaṃ padamavāpa /
T09bsa032_u:2913: sa kṛtapuṇyatvājjñānamāhātmyāllokajñatayā pratipattiguṇasauṣṭhavācca yatra yatra gacchati sma tatra tatraiva viduṣāṃ vidvatpriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmanyatīrthikānāṃ ca pravrajitānāmabhigamanīyo bhāvanīyaśca babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2914: guṇā hi puṇyāśrayalabdhadīptayo gatāḥ priyatvaṃ pratipattiśobhayā /
T09bsa032_u:2915: api dviṣadbhyaḥ svayaśonurakṣayā bhavanti satkāraviśeṣabhāginaḥ // Jm_23.1
T09bsa032_u:2916: atha sa mahātmā lokānugrahārthamanuvicaran grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhāṇīranyatamasya rājño viṣāyāntaramupajāgāma /
T09bsa032_u:2917: śrutagunavistaraprabhavastu sa rājā tasyāgamanaṃ dūrata evopalabhya prītamanā ramaṇīye svasminnudyānavanapradeśe tasyāvasathaṃ kārayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:2918: abhyudgamanādisatkārapuraḥsaraṃ cainaṃ praveśya svaviṣayaṃ śiṣya ivācāryaṃ paricaraṇaparyupāsanavidhinā saṃmānayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:2924: ka eva vādaḥ śucibhājanopame hitārthini premaguṇotsuke jane // Jm_23.3 //
T09bsa032_u:2925: atha tasya rājño 'mātyā labdhavidvatsaṃbhāvanā labdhasaṃmānāśca sadasyāḥ
T09bsa032_u:2930: prasahya cainaṃ śāstrakathāsvabhibhavitumaśaktā dharmaprasaṅgamamṛṣyamāṇāśca rājñastena tena krameṇa rājānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prati vigrāhayāmāsuḥ - nārhati devo bodhiparivrājake viśvāsamupagantum vyaktamayaṃ devasya guṇapriyatāṃ dharmābhimukhatāṃ copalabhya vyasanapratāraṇaślakṣṇaṭhamadhuravacanaḥ pravṛttisaṃcāraṇaheturabhūtaḥ kasyāpi pratyarthino rājño nipuṇaḥ praṇidhiprayogaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2931: tathā hi dharmātmako nāma bhūtvā devamekāntena kāruṇyapravṛttau hrīdainye ca samanuśāsti,
T09bsa032_u:2932: arthakāmoparodhiṣu ca kṣatradharmabāhyeṣvāsannāpanayeṣu dharmasamādāneṣu dayānuvṛttyā ca nāma te kṛtyapakṣamāśvāsanavidhinopagṛṇīte priyasaṃstavaścānyarājadūtaiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2935: atha tasya rājñaḥ punaḥ punarbhedopasaṃhitaṃ hitamiva bahubhirucyamānasya bodhisattvaṃ prati pariśaṅkāsaṃkocitasnehagauravaprasaramanyādṛśaṃ cittamabhavat /
T09bsa032_u:2937: visrambhavānmānuṣamātradhairyaḥ syānnirvikāro yadi nāma kaścit // Jm_23.5
T09bsa032_u:2938: atha sa rājā visrambhavirahanmandībhutapremabahumānastasmin mahāsattve na yathāpūrvaṃ satkāraprayogasumukho babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:2940: śuddhasvabhāvatvāt bahukāryavyāsaṅgā rājāna iti tanmanasi cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:2941: tatsamīpavartināṃ tu vinayopacāraśaithilyasaṃdarśanādviraktahṛdayamavetya rājānaṃ samādāya tridaṇḍāduṇḍikādyāṃ parivrājakabhāṇḍikāṃ prakramaṇasavyāpāraḥ samabhavat /
T09bsa032_u:2942: tadupaśrutya sa rājā sāvaśeṣasnehatayā dākṣiṇyavinayanuvṛttyā cainamabhigamya pradarśitasaṃbhramo vinivartayitukāma iva tamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:2944: vyalīkaśaṅkājanakaṃ nu kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ pramādaskhalitaṃ tvayā naḥ // Jm_23.6
T09bsa032_u:2948: abhajanatvaṃ tu gato 'si śāṭhyāddharmasya tenāhamito vrajāmi // Jm_23.7 //
T09bsa032_u:2949: athāsya sarabhasabhaṣitamativivṛtavadanamabhidravantaṃ vallabhaṃ śvānaṃ tatrāgatamabhipradarśayan punaruvāca - ayaṃ cātra mahārāja amānuṣaḥ sākṣinirdeśo dṛśyatām /
T09bsa032_u:2950: ayaṃ hi pūrvaṃ paṭucāṭukarmā bhūtvā mayi śvā bhavato 'nuvṛttyā /
T09bsa032_u:2951: ākāraguptyajñatayā tvidānīṃ tvadbhāvasūcāṃ bhaṣitaiḥ karoti // Jm_23.8 //
T09bsa032_u:2952: tvattaḥ śrutaṃ kiṃcidanena nūnaṃ madantare bhaktivipattirukṣam /
T09bsa032_u:2954: atha sa rājā tatpratyadeśād vrīḍāvanāmitavadanastena cāsya matinaipuṇyena samāvarjitamatirjātasaṃvego nedānīṃ śāṭhyānuvṛttikāla iti bodhisattvamabhipraṇamyovāca -
T09bsa032_u:2955: tvadāśrayā kacidabhūtkathaiṣā saṃprastutā naḥ sadasi pragalbhaiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:2956: upekṣitā kāryavaśānmayā ca tatkṣamyatāṃ tiṣṭha ca sādhu mā gāḥ // Jm_23.10
T09bsa032_u:2957: bodhisattva uvāca - naiva khalvahaṃ mahārāja asatkāraprakṛtatvādakṣamayā vā praṇudyamāṇo gacchāmi
T09bsa032_u:2958: na tvayaṃ mahārāja avasthānakāla iti na tiṣṭhāmi /
T09bsa032_u:2960: vimadhyabhāvādapi hīnaśobhe yāyāṃ na satkāravidhau svayaṃ cet /
T09bsa032_u:2963: ekāvamānābhihatā hi satsu pūrvopakārā na samībhavanti // Jm_23.12 //
T09bsa032_u:2968: sukhārthinaḥ kleśaparāṅmukhasya lokaprasiddhaḥ sphuṭa eṣa mārgaḥ //
T09bsa032_u:2971: asevanā cātyupasevanā ca yācñābhiyogāśca dahanti maitrīm /
T09bsa032_u:2972: rakṣyaṃ yataḥ prītyavaśeṣametannivāsadoṣāditi yāmi tāvat // Jm_23.16 //
T09bsa032_u:2976: bodhisattva uvāca - bahvantarāyo mahārāja bahūpadravapratyarthikatvāllokasaṃniveśa iti na śakyametadavadhāraṇayā pratijñātumāgamiṣyāmīti /
T09bsa032_u:2978: ityanunīya sa māhatmā taṃ rājānaṃ kṛtābhyanujñāsatkārastena rājñā tadviṣayātpracakrāma /
T09bsa032_u:2980: dhyānābhiyuktamatistatra viharannacireṇeva catvāri dhyānāni pañcābhijñāḥ pratilebhe /
T09bsa032_u:2981: tasya samasvāditapraśamasukharasasya smṛtiranukampanusāriṇī taṃ rājānaṃ prati prādurabhūt - kā nu khalu tasya rājño 'vastheti /
T09bsa032_u:2982: athainaṃ dadarśa tairamātyairyathābhiniviṣṭāni dṛṣṭigatāni prait pratāryamāṇam /
T09bsa032_u:2985: patrāṇi citrayati ko 'tra patatriṇāṃ vā svābhāvikaṃ jagadidaṃ niyataṃ tathaiva // Jm_23.17
T09bsa032_u:2988: nākasmikaṃ bhavitumarhati sarvametadastyatra sarvamadhi kaścidananta ekaḥ
T09bsa032_u:2989: svecchāviśeṣaniyamādya imaṃ vicitraṃ lokaṃ karoti ca punaśca samīkaroti //
T09bsa032_u:2992: evaṃ kariṣyati kathaṃ nu samānakālaṃ bhinnāśrayān bahuvidhānamitāṃśca bhāvān /
T09bsa032_u:2993: sarvaṃ tu pūrvakṛtakarmanimittametat saukhyaprayatnanipuṇo 'pi hi duḥkhameti // Jm_23.19 //
T09bsa032_u:2995: dārūṇi naikavidhavarṇaguṇākṛtīni karmātmakāni na bhavanti bhavanti caiva /
T09bsa032_u:2996: naṣṭāni naiva ca yathā punarudbhavanti lokastathāyamiti saukhyaparāyaṇaḥ syāt // Jm_23.20
T09bsa032_u:2997: apara enaṃ kṣatravidyāparidṛṣṭeṣu nītikauṭilyaprasaṅgeṣu nairghṛṇyamalineṣu dharmavirodhiṣvapi rājadharmo 'yamiti samanuśaśāsa -
T09bsa032_u:2998: chāyādrumeṣviva nareṣu kṛtāśrayeṣu tāvatkṛtajñacaritaiḥ svayaśaḥ parīpset
T09bsa032_u:2999: nārtho 'ti yāvadupabhoganayena teṣāṃ kṛtye tu yajña iva te paśavo niyojyāḥ
T09bsa032_u:3000: iti te 'mātyāstaṃ rājānaṃ tena tena dṛṣṭikṛtonmārgeṇa netumīṣuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3004: atha bodhisattvaḥ idamatra prāptakālamiti viniścitya svasminnāśramapade mahāntaṃ vānaramabhinirmāya ṛddhiprabhāvāttasya carmāpanīya śeṣamantardhāpayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:3007: niveditābhyāgamanaśca dauvārikairyathākramamāyudhīyaguptaparyantāmamātyadvijayodhadūpapauramukhyābhikīrṇāṃ vinītadhīrodāttaveṣajanāṃ sāsiyaṣṭibhiḥ pratihārairadhiṣṭhitapradvārāṃ siṃhāsanāvaśtitanarādhipāmanākulāṃ rājaparṣadamavajagāhe /
