T09bsa032_u:3477: iti niścitamatirvismṛtya taṃ rurumṛgasyopakāraṃ samupetya rājānamuvāca - ahaṃ deva taṃ mṛgavaramadhivāsaṃ cāsya jānāmi /
T09bsa032_u:3480: - mamaivainaṃ bhadra pradarśayetyuktvā mṛgayāprayāṇānurūpaṃ veṣamāsthāya mahatā balakāyena parivṛtaḥ puravarānnirgamya tena puruṣeṇādeśyamānamārgastaṃ nadītīramupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3481: parikṣipya ca tadvanagahanaṃ samagreṇa balakāyena dhanvī hastāvāpi vyavasitāptapuruṣaparivṛtaḥ sa rājā tenaiva puruṣeṇādeśyamānamārgastadvanagahanamanupraviveśa /
T09bsa032_u:3482: atha sa puruṣastaṃ rurumṛgaṃ viśvastasthitamālokya pradarśayāmāsa rājñe - ayamayaṃ deva sa
T09bsa032_u:3488: labdhaprayāmāṇi vipakṣamāndyātkarmāṇi sadyaḥ phalatāṃ vrajanti // Jm_26.19
T09bsa032_u:3489: atha sa rājā tatpradarśitena mārgeṇa rurusaṃdarśanakutūhale nayane vicikṣepa /
T09bsa032_u:3492: guṇairuruṃ taṃ sa ruruṃ dadarśa śātahnadaṃ vahnimivābhramakṣe // Jm_26.20
T09bsa032_u:3495: atha bodhisattvaḥ samantato janakolāhalamupaśrutya vyaktaṃ samantātparivṛtto 'smīti niścitamatirvyaddhukāmamupārūḍhaṃ cāvetya rājānaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3496: nāyamapayānakāla iti viditvā viśadapadākṣareṇa mānuṣeṇa vacasā rājānamābabhāṣe -
T09bsa032_u:3500: asāvatra mṛgo 'stīti ko nu te māṃ nyavedayat // Jm_26.23 //
T09bsa032_u:3501: atha sa rājā tasyādbhūtena mānuṣeṇābhivyāhāreṇa bhṛśataramāvarjitahṛdayastamasmai puruṣaṃ śarāgreṇa nirdideśa -
T09bsa032_u:3503: atha bodhisattvastaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyabhijñāya vigarhamāṇa uvāca - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3507: ātmano 'pi na dṛṣṭo 'yaṃ hitasyāpanayaḥ katham // Jm_26.25 //
T09bsa032_u:3508: atha sa rājā kiṃ nu khalvayamevaṃ vijugupsata iti samutpannakautūhalaḥ sāvegastaṃ rurumuvāca
T09bsa032_u:3510: tvadidaṃ samupaśrutya sākampamiva me manaḥ // Jm_26.26 //
T09bsa032_u:3512: manuṣyamamanuṣyaṃ vā pakṣiṇaṃ mṛgameva vā // Jm_26.27 //
T09bsa032_u:3514: nāyaṃ vigarhādara eva rājan kutsārhametattvavagamya karma /
T09bsa032_u:3515: nāyaṃ punaḥ kartumiti vyavasyettīkṣṇākṣaraṃ tena mayaivamuktam // Jm_26.28
T09bsa032_u:3517: ko hi kṣate kṣāramivāvasiñced rūkṣākṣaraṃ viskhaliteṣu vākyam /
T09bsa032_u:3518: priye tu putre 'pi cikitsakasya pravartate vyādhivaśāccikitsā // Jm_26.29
T09bsa032_u:3520: tato bhayaṃ māṃ nṛvaredamāgataṃ na khalvasatsaṃgatamasti bhūtaye //
T09bsa032_u:3521: atha sa rājā taṃ puruṣaṃ tīkṣṇayā dṛṣṭyā nirbhartsanarūkṣamavekṣyovāca -
T09bsa032_u:3522: satyamare re purā tvamanenaivamāpanno 'bhyuddhṛta iti? atha sa puruṣaḥ
T09bsa032_u:3524: atha sa rājā dhik tvāmityenamavabhartysayan dhanuṣi śaraṃ saṃdhāyābravīt - mā tāvadbhoḥ
T09bsa032_u:3525: evaṃvidhenāpi pariśrameṇa mṛdūkṛtaṃ yasya na nāma cetaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3528: atha bodhisattvaḥ karuṇayā mahatyā samuparudhyamānahṛdayastadantarā sthitvā rājānamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3531: hatastadeveha yaśaḥparikṣayād dhruvaṃ paratrāpi ca dharmasaṃkṣayāt //
T09bsa032_u:3533: pralobhyamānāḥ phalasampadāśayā pataṃgamūrkhā iva dīpaśobhayā // Jm_26.33
T09bsa032_u:3534: ataḥ kṛpāmatra kurūṣva mā ruṣaṃ yadīpsitaṃ caivamanena kiṃcana /
T09bsa032_u:3535: kiruṣva tenainamavandhyasāhasaṃ sthitaṃ tvadājñāpravaṇaṃ hi me śiraḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3537: atha sa rājā tena tasyāpakāriṇyapi sadayatvenākṛtakena ca tatpratyupakārādareṇa paramavismitamatirjātaprasādaḥ sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇastaṃ ruruvaramuvāca - sādhu sādhu mahābhāga
T09bsa032_u:3540: yenānukampyastu tavaiṣa jālmo hetuśca naḥ sajjanadarśanasya /
T09bsa032_u:3541: dadāmi tenepsitamarthamasmai rājye tavāsmiṃśca yatheṣṭacāram // Jm_26.36
T09bsa032_u:3543: tadājñāpaya yāvadiha saṃgamanaprayojanena tavopayogaṃ gacchāma iti /
T09bsa032_u:3544: atha sa rājā taṃ ruruṃ gurumiva rathavaramāropya mahatā satkāreṇa puravaraṃ praveśya kṛtātithisatkāraṃ mahati siṃhāsane niveśya samutsāhayamānaḥ sāntaḥpuro 'mātyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
T09bsa032_u:3546: dharmaṃ prati manuṣyāṇāṃ bahudhā buddhayo gatāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3547: niścayastava dharme tu yathā taṃ vaktumarhasi // Jm_26.37 //
T09bsa032_u:3548: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñaḥ saparṣatkasya sphuṭamadhuracitrākṣareṇa vacasā dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa
T09bsa032_u:3549: dayāṃ sattveṣu manye 'haṃ dharmaṃ saṃkṣepato nṛpa /
T09bsa032_u:3552: ātmanīva dayā syāccetsvajane vā yathā jane /
T09bsa032_u:3557: suvṛṣṭiriva sasyāni guṇān sā hi prasūyate // Jm_26.41 //
T09bsa032_u:3558: dayākrāntaṃ cittaṃ na bhavati paradroharabhasaṃ śucau tasmin vāṇī vrajati vikṛtaṃ naiva ca tanuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3559: vivṛddhā tasyaivaṃ parahitaruciḥ prītyanusṛtān pradānakṣāntyādīñjanayati guṇān kīrtyanuguṇān (Vaidya 181)
T09bsa032_u:3560: dayālurnodvegaṃ janayati pareṣāmupaśamād dayāvān viśvāsyo bhavati jagatāṃ bāndhava iva /
T09bsa032_u:3561: na saṃrambhakṣobhaḥ prabhavati dayādhīrahṛdaye na kopāgniścitte jvalati hi dayātoyaśiśire saṃkṣepeṇa dayāmataḥ sthiratayā paśyanti dharmaṃ buddhāḥ ko nāmāsti guṇaḥ sa sādhudayito yo nānuyāto dayām /
T09bsa032_u:3562: tasmātputra ivātmanīva ca dayāṃ nītvā prakarṣaṃ jane sadvṛttena haranmanāṃsi jagatāṃ rājatvamudbhāvaya atha sa rājā samabhinandya tattasya vacanaṃ sayaurajānapado dharmaparāyaṇo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:3572: bodhisattvaḥ kila śrīmati himavatkukṣau vividharasaviryavipākaguṇairbahubhiroṣadhiviśeṣaiḥ parigṛhītabhūmibhāge nāṇāvidhapuṣpaphalapallavapatraviṭaparaparacanairmahīruhaśatairākīrṇe sphaṭikadalāmalasalilaprasravaṇe vividhapakṣigaṇanādanādite vānarayūthādhipatirbabhūva /
T09bsa032_u:3574: sa tatra mahāntaṃ nyagrodhapādapaṃ parvataśikharamiva vyomollikhantamadhipatimiva tasya vanasya meghasaṃghātamiva pratyandhakāraviṭapamākīrṇaparṇatayā tālaphalādhikatarapramāṇaiḥ paramasvādubhirmanojñavarṇagandhaiḥ phalaviśeṣairānamyamānaśākhaṃ niśritya vijahāra /
T09bsa032_u:3577: tasya tu vanaspaterekā śākhā tatsamīpagāṃ nimnagāmabhi praṇatābhavat /
T09bsa032_u:3578: atha bodhisattvo dīrghadarśitvāttadvānarayūthaṃ samanuśaśāsa - asyāṃ nyogrodhaśākhāyāmaphalāyāmakṛtāyāṃ na vaḥ kena cidanyataḥ
T09bsa032_u:3580: atha kadācittasyāṃ śākhāyāṃ pipīlikābhiḥ parṇapuṭāvacchāditaṃ taruṇatvānnātimahadekaṃ phalaṃ na te vānarā dadṛśuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3581: tatkrameṇābhivardhamānaṃ varṇagandharasamārdavopapannaṃ paripākavaśācchithilabandhanaṃ tasyāṃ nadyāṃ nipapāta /
T09bsa032_u:3582: anupūrveṇa vāhyamāna nadīstrotasā 'nyatamasya rājñaḥ sāntaḥpurasya tasyāṃ nadyāṃ salilakrīḍāmanubhavato jālakaraṇḍakapārśve vyāsajyata /
T09bsa032_u:3584: visarpiṇā svena tiraścakāra ghrāṇābhirāmeṇa guṇodayena // Jm_27.2 //
T09bsa032_u:3588: kaūtuhalaprasṛtalolataranayanāstu tā yoṣitastannyagrodhaphalaṃ paripakvatālaphalādhikatarapramāṇaṃ jālakaraṇḍakapārśvato vilagnamavekṣya kimidamiti tadāvarjitanayanāḥ samapdyanta saha rājñā atha sa rājā tatphalamānāyya prātyayikavaidyajanaparidṛṣṭaṃ svayamāsvādayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:3593: atha tasya rājñaḥ svādurasabhojanasamucitasyāpi tadrasasaṃrāgavaśagasyaitada bhavat -
T09bsa032_u:3594: yo nāma nāmūni phalāni bhuṅkte sa kāni rājyasya phalāni bhuṅkte /
T09bsa032_u:3595: yasyānnametattu ca eva rājā vinaiva rājatvapariśrameṇa // Jm_27.6 //
T09bsa032_u:3596: sa tatprabhavānveṣaṇakṛtamatiḥ svabuddhyā vimamarśavyaktamayaṃ taruvara ito nātidūre nadītīrasaṃniviṣṭaśca yasyedaṃ phalaṃ tathā hyanupahatavarṇagandharasamadīrghakālasalilasaṃparkādaparikṣatamajarjaraṃ ca yataḥ śakyamasya prabhavo 'dhigantumiti niścayamupetya tadrasatṛṣṇayā ākṛṣyamāṇo viramya jalakrīḍāyāḥ samyak puravare sve rakṣāvidhānaṃ saṃdiśya yātrāsajjena mahatā balakāyena parivṛtastāṃ nadīmanusasāra /
T09bsa032_u:3597: krameṇa cotsādayan saśvāpadagaṇāni vanagahanāni samanubhavaṃ ścatrāṇi rasāntarāṇi paśyannakṛtrimaramaṇīyaśobhāni vanāntarāṇi saṃtrāsayan paṭaharasitairavanyagajamṛgān mānuṣajanadurgamaṃ tasya vanaspateḥ samīpamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3600: paripakvasahakāraphalasurabhitareṇa ca nirhāriṇā atimanojñena gandhena pratyudgata iva tasya pādapasya ayaṃ sa vanaspatiriti niścayamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3602: atha sa rājā samabhilaṣitārthavipralopinastān vānarān pratyabhikruddhamatiḥ - hata hataitān
T09bsa032_u:3603: vidhvaṃsayata vināśayata sarvān vānarajālmāniti saparuṣākṣaraṃ svān puruṣānādideśa /
T09bsa032_u:3604: atha te rājapuruṣāḥ sajyacāpabāṇavyagrakarāgrā vānarāvabhartsanamukharāḥ samudyataloṣṭadaṇḍaśastrāścāpare (Vaidya 184)
T09bsa032_u:3606: atha bodhisattvastumulaṃ tadrājabalamanilajavākalitamivārṇavajalamanibhṛtakalakalārāvamabhipatadālokyāśanivarṣeṇeva samantato vikīryamāṇaṃ taruvaraṃ śaraloṣṭadaṇḍaśastravarṣeṇa bhayavirasavirāvamātraparāyaṇaṃ ca vikṛtadīnamukhamunmukhaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3607: vānaragaṇamavekṣya mahatyā karuṇayā samākramyamāṇacetāstyaktaviṣādadainyasaṃtrāsaḥ samāśvāsya tadvānarayūthaṃ tatparitrāṇavyavasitamatirabhiruhya tasya vanaspateḥ śikharaṃ tatsamāsannaṃ giritaṭaṃ laṅghayitumiyeṣa /
T09bsa032_u:3608: athānekapraskandanakramaprāpyamapi taṃ giritaṭaṃ sa mahāsattvaḥ svavīryātiśayātkhaga ivādhiruroha
T09bsa032_u:3611: kṛpayābhivivardhitaḥ sa tasya vyavasāyaḥ paṭutāṃ jagāma śauryāt /
T09bsa032_u:3612: sa ca yatnaviśeṣamasya cakre manasaivātha jagāma yatnataikṣṇyāt // Jm_27.9
T09bsa032_u:3613: adhiruhya ca gireruccataraṃ tātapradeśaṃ tadantarālādhikapramāṇayā mahatyā virūḍhayā 'śithilamūlayā dṛḍhayā vetralatayā gāḍhamābadhya caraṇau punastaṃ vanaspatiṃ pracaskandaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3614: viprakṛṣṭatvāttu tasyāntarālasya caraṇabandhanavyākulatvācca sa mahāsattvaḥ kathaṃcittasya vanaspateragraśākhāṃ karābhyāṃ samāsasāda /
T09bsa032_u:3615: tataḥ samālambya dṛḍhaṃ sa śākhāmātatya tāṃ vetralatāṃ ca yatnāt /
T09bsa032_u:3619: gātraṃ yayau svaiḥ piśitairviyogaṃ na tveva dhairyātiśayena cetaḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3621: taddṛṣṭvā sa rājā te ca rājapuruṣāḥ parāṃ vismayavaktavyatāmupajagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3623: āścaryabuddhiṃ janayecchrutāpi pratyakṣataḥ kiṃ punarīkṣyamāṇā // Jm_27.12
T09bsa032_u:3624: atha sa rājā tān puruṣān samādideśabhayodbhrāntavānaragaṇacaraṇakṣobhitakṣataśarīraściramekakramāvasthānācca dṛḍhaṃ pariśrānto vyaktamayaṃ vānarādhipatiḥ na cāya mataḥ śakṣyati svayamātmānaṃ saṃhartum, tacchrīghramasyādhaḥ paṭavitānaṃ vitatya
T09bsa032_u:3627: athainaṃ sa rājā śanakairvitānādavatārya murchayā vraṇavedanāklamopajātayā samākramyamāṇacetasaṃ mṛduni śayanīye saṃveśayāmāsa /
T09bsa032_u:3628: sadyaḥkṣatapraśamanayogyaiśca sarpirādibhirasya vraṇānyabhyajya mandībhūtapariśramaṃ samāśvastamenamabhyupagamya sa rājā sakautūhalavismayabahumānaḥ kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3629: gatvā svayaṃ saṃkramatāmamīṣāṃ svajīvite tyaktadayena bhutvā /
T09bsa032_u:3630: samuddhṛtā ye kapayastvayeme ko nu tvameṣāṃ tava vā ka ete // Jm_27.13 //
T09bsa032_u:3632: na hyalpasauhārdanibandhanānāmevaṃ manāṃsi prataranti kartum // Jm_27.14
T09bsa032_u:3633: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñastadabhyupapattisaumukhyaṃ pratipūjayannātmanivedanamanuguṇena krameṇa cakāra -
T09bsa032_u:3637: samānajātitvamayī ca maitrī jñāteyajātā sahavāsayogāt // Jm_27.16 //
T09bsa032_u:3639: tacchrutvā sa rājā paraṃ vismayamupetya punarenamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3642: bodhisattva uvāca - kāmamevaṃ pravṛttā, mahārāja, rājanītiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3645: prāgeva bhaktyunmukhamānasamya gatasya bandhupriyatāṃ janasya // Jm_27.18
T09bsa032_u:3646: idaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vyasanārtidainyaṃ śākhāmṛgān pratyabhivardhamānam /
T09bsa032_u:3653: tataḥ karābhyāṃ samavāpamasya prasāritaṃ prasāritaṃ pāṇimivāgraśākhām //
T09bsa032_u:3654: samātatāṅgaṃ latayā tayā ca śākṣāgrahastena ca pādapasya /
T09bsa032_u:3655: amī madadhyākramaṇe viśaṅkā niśritya māṃ svasti gatāḥ svayūthyāḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3656: atha sa rājā pramodyajātaṃ tasyāmapyavasthāyāṃ taṃ mahāsattvamavekṣya paraṃ vismayamudvahan punarenamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3659: ityātmani samāropya prāptaḥ ko bhavatā guṇaḥ // Jm_27.24 //
T09bsa032_u:3661: kāmaṃ śarīraṃ kṣitipa kṣataṃ me manaḥ parasvāsthyamupāgataṃ tu /
T09bsa032_u:3662: akāri yeṣāṃ ciramādhipatyaṃ teṣāṃ mayārtirvinivartiteti // Jm_27.25 //
T09bsa032_u:3664: vīrā yathā vikramacihnaśobhāṃ prītyā tathemāṃ rujamudvahāmi // Jm_27.26 //
T09bsa032_u:3667: tanmāṃ tapatyeṣa na duḥkhayogaḥ suhṛdviyogaḥ sukhaviplavo vā /
T09bsa032_u:3668: krameṇa cānena amabhyupeto mahotsavābhyāgama eṣa mṛtyuḥ // Jm_27.28 //
T09bsa032_u:3670: pūjā nṛpānnirbhayatā ca mṛtyoḥ kṛtajñabhāvād grahaṇaṃ ca satsu // Jm_27.29
T09bsa032_u:3671: ete guṇāḥ sadguṇavāsavṛkṣa prāptā mayaitad vyasanaṃ prapadya /
T09bsa032_u:3672: eṣāṃ vipakṣāṃstu samabhyupaiti dayāvihīno nṛpatiḥ śriteṣu // Jm_27.30 //
T09bsa032_u:3674: gatirbhavettasya ca nama kānyā jvālākulebhyo narakānalebhyaḥ // Jm_27.31
T09bsa032_u:3677: dharmeṇa tasmādanuśādhi rājyaṃ strīcañcalapremaguṇā hi lakṣmīḥ // Jm_27.32
T09bsa032_u:3679: sarvān sukhena prayateta yoktuṃ hitānukūlena piteva rājā // Jm_27.33 //
T09bsa032_u:3680: evaṃ hi dharmārthayaśaḥsamṛddhiḥ syātte sukhāyeha paratra caiva /
T09bsa032_u:3682: iti nṛpamanuśiṣya śisyavad bahumatavākprayatena tena saḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3684: tedevaṃ dviṣatāmapi manāṃsyāvarjayanti sadvṛttānuvartinaḥ, iti lokaṃ samāvarjayitukāmena sadvṛttānuvartinā bhavitavyam /
T09bsa032_u:3685: na samarthāstathā svārthamapi pratipattuṃ sattvā yathā parārthaṃ pratipannavān sa bhagavāniti tathāgatavarṇe 'pi vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:3692: 28. Kṣāntijātakam sātmībhūtakṣamāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānamahatāṃ nāviṣahyaṃ nāma kiṃcidasti /
T09bsa032_u:3694: bodhisattvaḥ kilānekadoṣavyasanopasṛṣṭamarthakāmapradhānatvādanaupaśamikaṃ rāgadveṣamohāmarṣasaṃrambhamadamānamātsaryādidoṣarajasāmāpātaṃ pātanaṃ hrīdharmaparigrahasyāyatana lobhāsadgrāhasya kukāryasaṃbādhatvātkṛśavakāśaṃ dharmasyāvetya gṛhavāsaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3696: tamaskhalitasamādānaṃ kṣāntivarṇavādinaṃ tadanurūpadharmākhyānakramaṃ vyatītya sve nāmagotre kṣāntivādinamityeva lokaḥ svabuddhipūrvakaṃ saṃjajñe /
T09bsa032_u:3700: cakāra yatkṣāntikathāḥ prasaktaṃ tatkṣāntivādīti tato vijajñe // Jm_28.2
T09bsa032_u:3702: tadarthayuktāśca kathāviśeṣāḥ kīrtyā muniṃ taṃ prathayāṃbabhūvuḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3705: tanmaṅgalyaṃ manojñaṃ ca tattīrthaṃ tattapovanam // Jm_28.4 //
T09bsa032_u:3706: sa tatra bahumanyamānastadadhyuṣitairdevatāviśeṣairabhigamyamānaśca śreyobhilāṣiṇāguṇavatsalena janena kṣāntipratisaṃyuktābhiḥ śrutihṛdayalhādinībhirdharmyābhiḥ kathābhisatasya janakāyasya paramanugrahaṃ cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:3707: atha kadācittatastyo rājā grīṣmakālaprabhāvādabhilaṣaṇīyatarāṃ salilakrīḍāṃ prati samutsukamatirudyānaguṇātiśayaniketabhūtaṃ taṃ vanapradeśaṃ sāntaḥpuraḥ samabhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3710: alaṃcakāreva caran vilāsī vibhūtimatyā lalitānuvṛttyā // Jm_28.5 //
T09bsa032_u:3716: tṛptiryathāsītkusumairna tāsāṃ tathaiva nāsāṃ lalitairnṛpasya // Jm_28.8
T09bsa032_u:3718: dadarśa rājā bhramarāyamāṇāḥ puṣpadrumeṣu pramadākṣimālāḥ // Jm_28.9 //
T09bsa032_u:3719: madapragalbhānyapi kokilānāṃ rutāni nṛtyāni ca barhiṇānām /
T09bsa032_u:3722: natā iva svena kalaguṇena cakrurmayūrāḥ kṣitipasya sevām // Jm_28.11 //
T09bsa032_u:3723: sa tatra sāntaḥpura udyānavanavihārasukhaṃ prakāmamanubhūya krīḍāprasaṅgaparikhedānmadapariṣvaṅgācca śrīmati vimānapradeśe mahārhaśayanīyavaragato nidrāvaśamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3724: atha tā yoṣitaḥ prastāvāntaragatamavetya rājānaṃ vanaśobhābhirākṣipyamāṇahṛdayāstaddarśanāvitṛptā yathāprītikṛtasamavāyāḥ samākulabhūṣaṇatinādasaṃmiśrakalapralāpāḥ samantataḥ prasasruḥ (Vaidya 191)
T09bsa032_u:3727: tāḥ prāpya rūpāṇi mahīruhāṇāṃ puṣpāṇi cārūṇi ca pallavāni /
T09bsa032_u:3730: paryāptapuṣpābharaṇasrajo 'pi lobhādanālupya na tā vyatīyuḥ // Jm_28.14 //
T09bsa032_u:3731: atha tā vanaramaṇīyatayākṣipyamāṇahṛdayā rājayoṣitastadvanamanuvicarantyaḥ kṣāntivādina āśramapadamupajagmuḥ
T09bsa032_u:3732: viditatapaḥprabhāvamāhātmyāstu tasya muneḥ strījanādhikṛtā rājño vāllabhyād durāsadatvācca tāsāṃ naināstato vārayituṃ prasehire /
T09bsa032_u:3733: abhisaṃskāraramaṇīyatarayā cāśramapadaśriyā samākṛṣyamāṇā iva tā yoṣitaḥ praviśyāśramapadaṃ dadṛśustatra taṃ munivaraṃ praśamasaumyadarśanamatigāmbhīryātiśayād durāsadamabhijvalantamiva tapaḥśriyā dhyānābhiyogādudāraviṣayasaṃnikarṣe 'pyakṣubhitendriyanaibhṛtyaśobhaṃ sākṣāddharmamiva maṅgalyaṃ puṇyadarśanaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3735: atha tā rājastriyastasya tapastejasākrāntasattvāḥ saṃdarśanādeva tyaktavibhramavilāsauddhatyā vinayanibhṛtamabhigamyainaṃ paryupāsāṃcakrire /
T09bsa032_u:3739: avaśyamṛtyurna karoti yaḥ śubhaṃ pramādabhākpratyahameṣa vañcyate //
T09bsa032_u:3740: kulena rūpeṇa vayoguṇena vā balaprakarṣeṇa dhanodayena vā /
T09bsa032_u:3741: paratra nāpnoti sukhāni kaścana pradānaśīlādiguṇairasaṃskṛtaḥ // Jm_28.16
T09bsa032_u:3745: kulasya rūpasya vayoguṇasya vā balaprakarṣasya dhanocchrayasya vā /
T09bsa032_u:3750: janasya ceyaṃ na khalu svabhāvataḥ parāśrayādvā trividhā tu karmaṇaḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3751: avetya caivaṃ niyatāṃ jagatsthitiṃ calaṃ vināśapravaṇaṃ ca jīvitam /
T09bsa032_u:3752: jahīta pāpāni śubhakramāśayādayaṃ hi panthā yaśase sukhāya ca // Jm_28.21
T09bsa032_u:3754: ataḥ prayatnena sa pāpabhīruṇā janena varjyaḥ pratipakṣaśaṃśrayāt //
T09bsa032_u:3757: iti kṣāntyā pāpaṃ pariharati taddhetvabhibhavād ataścāyaṃ vairaṃ na janayati maitryāśrayabalāt
T09bsa032_u:3759: priyaḥ pūjyaścāsmādbhavati sukhabhāgeva ca tataḥ prayātyante ca dyāṃ svagṛhamiva puṇyāśrayaguṇāt api ca bhavatyaḥ kṣāntirnāmaiṣā -
T09bsa032_u:3760: śubhasvabhāvātiśayaḥ prasiddhaḥ puṇyena kīrtyā ca parā vivṛddhiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3768: hantīti yā dharmavipakṣamāyāṃ prāhuḥ sukhaṃ civa vimokṣamāyām /
T09bsa032_u:3769: tasmānna kuryātka iva kṣamāyāṃ prayatnamekāntahitakṣamāyām // Jm_28.29 //
T09bsa032_u:3770: iti sa mahātmā tāsāṃ dharmātithyaṃ cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:3771: atha sa rājā nidrāklamavinodanātprativibuddhaḥ sāvaśeṣamadagurunayano madanānuvṛttyā kutra devya iti śayanapālikāḥ sabhrūkṣepaṃ paryapṛcchat /
T09bsa032_u:3772: etā deva vanāntarāṇyupaśobhayamānāstadvibhūtiṃ paśyantīti copalabhya śayanapālikābhyaḥ sa rājā devījanasya visrambhaniryantraṇahasitakathitadravaviceṣṭitadarśanotsukamatirutthāya śayanādyuvatidhṛtacchatravyajanottarīyakhaṅgaḥ sakañcukairvetradaṇḍapāṇibhirantapurāvacaraiḥ kṛtānuyātrastadvanamanuvicacāra /
T09bsa032_u:3774: dṛṣṭaiva tu sa rājā kṣāntivādinaṃ tamṛṣivaraṃ devijanaparivṛtaṃ pūrvavairānuśayadoṣānmadaparibhramitasmṛtitvādīrṣyāparābhūtamatitvācca paraṃ kopamupajagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3776: bhraṣṭavinayopacārasauṣṭhavaḥ saṃrambhapāpmābhibhavādāpatitasvedavaivarṇyavepathurbhrūbhaṅgajihmavivṛttasthirābhitāmranayano viraktakāntilāvaṇyaśobhaḥ pracalatkanakavalayau parimṛdnan sāṅgalivibhūṣaṇau pāṇī tamṛṣivaramadhikṣipaṃstattaduvāca haṃho -
T09bsa032_u:3779: tacchrutvā varṣavarāḥ sasaṃbhramāvegā rājanamūcuḥ - deva mā maivam /
T09bsa032_u:3781: upahatādhyāśayatvāttu sa rājā tatteṣāṃ vacanamapratigṛhṇannuvāca - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ
T09bsa032_u:3784: tadayamasya tāpasanepathyāvacchāditaṃ māyaśāṭhyasaṃbhṛtaṃ kuhakasvabhāvaṃ prakāṣayāmītyuktvā pratihārīhastādasimādāya hantumutpatitaniścayastamṛṣivaraṃ sapatnavacabhijagāma /
T09bsa032_u:3785: atha tā devyaḥ parijananiveditābhyagamanamālokya rājānaṃ krodhasaṃkṣiptasaumyabhāvaṃ vitānībhūtahṛdayāḥ sasaṃbhramāvegacañcalanayanāḥ samutthāyābhivādya ca tamṛṣivaraṃ samudyatāñjalikuḍmalāḥ śarannalinya iva samudgataikapaṅkajānanamukulā rājānamabhijagmuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3787: na tasya śamayāmāsa krodhāgnijvalitaṃ manaḥ // Jm_28.32 //
T09bsa032_u:3788: labdhataraprāṇaprasarāstu tā devyaḥ sasaṃrambhavikārasamudācārarūkṣakramaṃ sāyudhamabhipatantaṃ tamudīkṣya rājānaṃ tamṛṣivaraṃ prati vivartitābhinivisṭadṛṣṭiṃ samāvṛṇvatya ūcuḥ - deva mā mā khalu sāhasaṃ kārṣīḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3790: praduṣṭabhāvāttu sa rājā samāvarjitabhāvā nūnamanenemā iti suṣṭhutaraṃ kopamupetya sphuṭaraṃ bhrūbhaṅgairasūyāsamāveśatīkṣṇaistiryagavekṣitaistattāsāṃ praṇayaprāgalbhyamavabhartsya saroṣamavekṣamāṇaḥ strījanādhikṛtāñchiraḥkampādākampamānakuṇḍalamukuṭaviṭapastā yoṣito 'bhivīkṣamāṇa uvāca vadatyeva kṣamāmeṣa na tvenāṃ pratipadyate /
T09bsa032_u:3791: tathā hi yoṣitsaṃparkatṛṣṇā na kṣāntavānayam // Jm_28.33 //
T09bsa032_u:3795: atha tā devyastasmin rājani krodhasaṃrambhakarkaśahṛdaye pratyāhatapraṇayāḥ prajānānāśca tasya rājñaścaṇḍatāṃ duranuneyatāṃ ca vaimanasyadainyākrāntamanasaḥ strījanādhikṛtairbhayaviṣādavyākulitairhastasaṃjñābhirapasāryamāṇā vrīḍāvanatavadanāstamṛṣivaryaṃ samanuśocantyastato 'pacakramuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3797: ko vetti kāmapi vivṛtya vikāralīlaṃ kenāpi yāsyapi pathā kṣitipasya roṣaḥ
T09bsa032_u:3798: kṣitīśavṛttiṃ pratilabdhakīrtiṃ tanuṃ munerasya tapastanuṃ ca /
T09bsa032_u:3799: amūnyanāgāṃsi ca no manāṃsi tulyaṃ hi hanyādapi nāma rājā // Jm_28.36 //
T09bsa032_u:3800: iti tāsu devīṣvanuśocitaviniḥśvasitamātraparāyaṇāsvapayātāsu sa rājā tamṛṣīvaraṃ saṃtarjayan roṣavaśanniṣkṛṣya khaṅgaṃ svayameva cchettumupacakrame /
T09bsa032_u:3804: atha bodhisattvaḥ kṣāntiparicayādavicalitadhṛtistenāsatkāraprayogeṇa taṃ rājānaṃ roṣasaṃrambhavirūpaceṣṭitaṃ bhraṣṭavinayopacāraśriyaṃ vismṛtātmahitāhitapathamāgatavismayaḥ kṣaṇamabhivīkṣya karūṇāyamānaḥ samuneṣyanniyatamīdṛśaṃ kiṃciduvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3805: bhāgyāparādhajanito 'pyapamānayogaḥ saṃdṛśyate jagati tena na me 'tra
T09bsa032_u:3807: dūḥkhaṃ tu me yaducitābhigatesu vṛttirvācāpi na tvayi mayā kriyate yathārham // Jm_28.38 //
T09bsa032_u:3810: na yuktarūpaṃ sahasā pravartituṃ vimarśamārgo 'pyanugamyatāṃ yataḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3813: na kāryatattvaṃ sahasaiva lakṣyate vimarśamaprāpya viśeṣahetubhiḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3814: vimṛśya kāryaṃ tvavagamya tattvataḥ prapadya dharmeṇa ca nītivartmanā /
T09bsa032_u:3815: mahānti dharmārthasukhāni sādhayajanasya taireva na hīyate nṛpaḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3818: tapovane tvadbhujavīryarakṣite pareṇa yannāma kṛtaṃ na marṣayeḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3819: hitakramonmāthi yadāryagarhitaṃ svayaṃ mahīnātha kathaṃ vyavasyasi //
T09bsa032_u:3820: striyo 'bhiyātā yadi te mamāśramaṃ yadṛcchayāntaḥpuraraikṣibhiḥ saha /
T09bsa032_u:3821: vyatikramastatra ca no bhavetkiyān ruṣāyadevaṃ gamito 'si vikriyām //
T09bsa032_u:3822: athāpyayaṃ syādaparādha eva me kṣamā tu śobheta tathāpi te nṛpa /
T09bsa032_u:3823: kṣamā hi śaktasya paraṃ vibhūṣaṇaṃ guṇānurakṣānipūnatvasūcanāt // Jm_28.45
T09bsa032_u:3827: tapodhaneṣvabhyuditā hi vṛttayaḥ kṣitīśvarāṇāṃ bahumānapeśalāḥ // Jm_28.47
T09bsa032_u:3831: na tāpasacchadma bibharti cedbhavān sthito 'si vā sve niyamavrate yadi /
T09bsa032_u:3833: bodhisattva uvāca - śrūyatāṃ mahārāja yadartho 'yaṃ mama prayatnaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3835: iti te matkṛte mā bhūdyaśo vācyavijarjaram // Jm_28.49 //
T09bsa032_u:3837: iti me na bhayaṃ tasmātsvaṃ vṛttaṃ canupaśyataḥ // Jm_28.50 //
T09bsa032_u:3838: sukhodarkasya dharmasya pīḍā mā bhuttathaiva tu /
T09bsa032_u:3842: atha sa rājā sūnṛtānyapi tānyanādṛtya tasya munervacanakusumāni sāsūyaṃ tamṛṣivaramuvāca - drakṣyāma idānīṃ te kṣāntyanurāgamityuktvā nivāraṇārthamiṣadabhiprasāritamabhyucchritapratanudīrghāṅgaliṃ tasya
T09bsa032_u:3843: munerdakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ niśitenāsinā kamalamiva nāladeśād vyayojayat /
T09bsa032_u:3844: chinne 'grahaste 'pi tu tasya nāsīdduḥkhaṃ tathā kṣāntidṛḍhavratasya /
T09bsa032_u:3851: bodhisattvastvanunayākṣamamenaṃ viditvāyaṃ ca nāmāsya nirbandha iti nainaṃ kiṃciduvāca /
T09bsa032_u:3852: atha sa rājā tasya mahātmano dvitīyaṃ pāṇibhūmau bāhu karṇanāsaṃ caraṇau tathaiva nicakarta
T09bsa032_u:3853: patati tu niśite 'pyasau śarīre na munivaraḥ sa śuśoca no cukopa /
T09bsa032_u:3854: parividitaśarīrayantraniṣṭhaḥ paricitayā ca jane kṣamānuvṛttyā // Jm_28.55
T09bsa032_u:3857: nāsīd duḥkhaṃ prītiyogānnṛpaṃ tu bhraṣṭaṃ dharmādvikṣya saṃtāpamāpa //
T09bsa032_u:3860: ghoraṃ tu tatkarmaḥ nṛpaḥ sa kṛtvā sadyo jvareṇānugato 'gnineva /
T09bsa032_u:3861: vinirgataścopavanāntadeśād gāṃ cāvadīrṇāṃ sahasā viveśa // Jm_28.58 //
T09bsa032_u:3862: nimagne tu tasmin rājani bhīmaśabdamavadīrṇāyāṃ vahnijvālākulāyāṃ samudbhūte mahati kolāhale samantataḥ prakṣubhite vyākule rājakule tasya rājño 'mātyā jānānāstasya munestapaḥprabhāvamāhātmyaṃ tatkṛtaṃ ca rājño dharaṇītalanimajjanaṃ manyamānāḥ purāyamṛṣivarastasya rājño doṣātsarvamidaṃ janapadaṃ nirdahatīti jātabhayāśaṅkāḥ samabhigamya
T09bsa032_u:3865: śāpānalasyendhanatāṃ sa eva prayātu te mā puramasya kṣākṣīḥ // Jm_28.59 //
T09bsa032_u:3867: tatsādhu deśaṃ kṣitipasya tasya svaṃ caiva dharmaṃ guṇapakṣa rakṣa //
T09bsa032_u:3868: athaitān bodhisattvaḥ samāśvāsayannuvāca - mā bhaiṣṭa āyuṣmantaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3870: chinnavān yo 'pi tāvanme vane nivasata sataḥ // Jm_28.61 //
T09bsa032_u:3872: ciraṃ jīvatvasau rājā mā cainaṃ pāpamāgamat // Jm_28.62 //
T09bsa032_u:3874: dagdhe duścaritaiḥ śocye kaḥ kopaṃ kartumarhati // Jm_28.63 //
T09bsa032_u:3875: syāllabhyarūpastu yadi kramo 'yaṃ mayyeva pacyeta tadasya pāpam /
T09bsa032_u:3878: trātuṃ na śakyastu mayā yadevaṃ vinirdahannātmahitaṃ sa rājā /
T09bsa032_u:3879: utsṛjya tāmātmagatāmaśaktiṃ rājñe kariṣyāmi kimityasūyām // Jm_28.65 //
T09bsa032_u:3880: ṛte 'pi rājño maraṇādiduḥkhaṃ jātena sarveṇa niṣevitavyam /
T09bsa032_u:3881: janmaiva tenātra na marṣaṇīyaṃ tannāsti cetkiṃ ca kutaśca duḥkham //
T09bsa032_u:3883: jahyāṃ kathaṃ tatpralaye titikṣāṃ tṛṇasya hetoriva ratnajāṭam // Jm_28.67
T09bsa032_u:3885: kimakṣamāyāṃ praṇayaṃ kariṣye tadbhaiṣṭa mā svasti ca vo 'stu yāt //
T09bsa032_u:3886: iti sa munivaro 'nuśiṣya tān samamupanīya ca sādhuśiṣyatām /
T09bsa032_u:3888: tadevaṃ sātmībhūtakṣamāṇāṃ pratisaṃkhyānamahatāṃ nāviṣahyaṃ nāmāstīti kṣāntiguṇasaṃvarṇane munimupanīya vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:3889: cāpalākṣāntidoṣanidarśane rājānamupanīya kāmādinavakathāyāmapi vācyam - evaṃ kāmahetorduścaritamāsevya vinipātabhāgino bhavantīti /
T09bsa032_u:3895: bodhisattvaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān dhyānābhyāsopacitasya kuśalasya karmaṇo vipākaprabhāvād brahmaloke janma pratilebhe /
T09bsa032_u:3896: tasya tanmahadapi dhyānaviśeṣādhigataṃ brāhmaṃ sukhaṃ pūrvajanmasu kāruṇyaparicayānnaiva parahitakaraṇavyāpāranirutsukaṃ manaścakāra /
T09bsa032_u:3898: dhyānasukhairapi tu satāṃ na tiraskriyate parahitecchā // Jm_29.1 //
T09bsa032_u:3899: atha kadācitsa mahātmā karuṇāśrayabhūtaṃ vividhadūḥkhavyasanaśatopasṛṣṭamutkliṣṭavyāpādavihiṃsākāmadhātuṃ kāmadhātuṃ vyalokayan dadarśa videharājamaṅgadinnaṃ nāma kumitrasaṃparkadoṣādasanmanaskāraparicayācca mithyādṛṣṭigahane paribhramantam /
T09bsa032_u:3900: nāsti paralokaḥ, kutaḥ śubhaśubhānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipāka ityevaṃ sa niścayamupetya praśāntadharmakriyautsukyaḥ pradānaśīlādisukṛtapratipattivimukhaḥ saṃrūḍhaparibhavabuddhirdhārmikeṣvaśraddhārūkṣamatirdharmaśāstreṣu parihāsacittaḥ parlokakathāsu śithilavinayopacāragauravabahumānaḥ
T09bsa032_u:3902: śubhāśubhaṃ karma sukhāsukhodayaṃ dhruvaṃ paratreti virūḍhaniścayaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3903: apāsya pāpa yatate śubhāśrayo yatheṣṭamaśraddhatayā tu gamyate // Jm_29.2
T09bsa032_u:3904: atha sa mahātmā devarṣistasya rājñastena dṛṣṭivyasanopanipātenāpāyikena lokānarthākarabhūtena samāvarjitānukampastasya rājño viṣayasukhākalitamateḥ śrīmati pravivikte vimānadeśe
T09bsa032_u:3906: atha sa rājā tamagniskandhamiva jvalantaṃ vidyutsamūhamiva cāvabhāsamānaṃ dinakarakīraṇasaṃghātamiva ca parayā dīptyā virocamānamabhivīkṣya tattejasābhibhūtamatiḥ sasaṃbhramaḥ prāñjalirena pratyutthāya sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇa ityuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:3907: karoti te bhūriva saṃparigrahaṃ nabho 'pi padmopamapāda pādayoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3908: vibhāsi saurīmiva codvahan prabhāṃ vilocanānandanarūpa ko bhavān //
T09bsa032_u:3910: jitvā dṛptau śāstravamukhyāviva saṃkhye rāgadveṣau cittasamādānabalena /
T09bsa032_u:3912: brāhmaṃ lokaṃ ye 'bhigatā bhūmipa teṣāṃ devarṣīṇāmanyatamaṃ māṃ tvamavehi // Jm_29.4 //
T09bsa032_u:3913: ityukte sa rājā svāgatādipriyavacanapuraḥsaraṃ pādyārghyasatkāramasmai samupahṛtya savismayamenamabhivīkṣamāṇa uvāca - āścaryarūpaḥ khalu te
T09bsa032_u:3918: dhyānasya śīlasya ca nirmalasya varasya caivendriyasaṃvarasya /
T09bsa032_u:3920: rājovāca - kiṃ satyamevedamasti paraloka iti? brahmovāca - āma /
T09bsa032_u:3922: rājovāca - kathaṃ punaridaṃ mārṣa śakyamasmābhirapi śraddhātuṃ syāt? bodhisattva uvāca - sthūlametanmahārāja pratyakṣādipramāṇayuktigrāhyamāptajananidarśitakramaṃ parīkṣākramagamyaṃ
T09bsa032_u:3926: pratyakṣarūpaḥ paraloka eṣa mā te 'tra saṃdehajaḍā matirbhūt // Jm_29.7 //
T09bsa032_u:3927: jātismarāḥ santi ca tatra tatra dhyānābhiyogātsmṛtipāṭavācca /
T09bsa032_u:3928: ato 'pi lokaḥ parato 'numeyaḥ sākṣyaṃ ca nanvatra kṛtaṃ mayaiva // Jm_29.8
T09bsa032_u:3930: ādyā hi yā garbhagatasya buddhiḥ sānantaraṃ pūrvakajanmabuddheḥ // Jm_29.9
T09bsa032_u:3931: jñeyāvabodhaṃ ca vadanti buddhiṃ janmādibuddherviṣayo 'sti tasmāt /
T09bsa032_u:3933: na caihiko 'sau nayanādyabhāvātsiddhau yadiyastu paraḥ sa lokaḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3934: pitryaṃ svabhāvaṃ vyatiricya dṛṣṭaḥ śīlādibhedaśca yataḥ prajānām /
T09bsa032_u:3939: abhyāsasiddhirhi paṭukaroti śikṣāgaṇaṃ karmasu teṣu teṣu // Jm_29.13 //
T09bsa032_u:3941: yatsaṃkucanti vikasanti ca apṅkajāti kāmaṃ tadanyabhavaceṣṭisiddhireṣā /
T09bsa032_u:3942: no cettadiṣṭamatha kiṃ stanapānayatnaṃ jātyantarīyakapariśramajaṃ karoṣi
T09bsa032_u:3944: dṛṣṭo hi kālaniyamaḥ kamalaprabodhe saṃmīlane ca na punaḥ stanapānayatne /
T09bsa032_u:3945: yatnaśca nāsti kamale stanape tu dṛṣṭaḥ sūryaprabhāva iti padmavikāsahetuḥ
T09bsa032_u:3946: tadevaṃ mahārāja samyagupaparīkṣamāṇena śakyametacchraddhātum - asti paraloka iti /
T09bsa032_u:3947: atha sa rājā mithyādṛṣṭiparigrahābhiniviṣṭabuddhitvādupacitapāpatvācca tāṃ paralokakathāṃ śrutvā asukhāyamāna uvāca - bho maharṣe,
T09bsa032_u:3948: lokaḥ paro yadi na bālavibhīṣikaiṣā grāhyaṃ mayaitaditi vā yadi manyase tvam /
T09bsa032_u:3949: teneha naḥ pradiśa niṣkaśatāni pañca tatte sahasramahamanyabhave pradāsye // Jm_29.16 //
T09bsa032_u:3951: atha bodhisattvastadasya prāgalbhyaparicayanirviśaṅkaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiviṣodgārabhūtamasamudācāravacanaṃ yukteneva krameṇa pratyuvāca
T09bsa032_u:3952: ihāpi tāvaddhanasaṃpadarthinaḥ prayuñjate naiva dhanaṃ durātmani /
T09bsa032_u:3953: na ghasmare nānipuṇe na cālase gataṃ hi yattatra tadantameti tat //
T09bsa032_u:3954: yameva paśyanti tu savyapatrapaṃ śamābhijātaṃ vyavahāranaipuṇam /
T09bsa032_u:3955: ṛṇaṃ prayacchanti raho 'pi tadvidhe tadarpaṇaṃ hyabhyudayāvahaṃ dhanam //
T09bsa032_u:3956: kramaśca tāvadvidha eva gamyatāmṛṇaprayoge nṛpa pāralaukike /
T09bsa032_u:3961: na caiva tārāgaṇabhūṣaṇaṃ nabhaḥ saraḥ prabuddhaiḥ kumudairivekṣyate //
T09bsa032_u:3962: paratra yasminnivasanti nāstikā ghanaṃ tamastatra himaśca mārutaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3963: karoti yo 'stīnyapi dārayan rujaṃ tamātmavān kaḥ praviśeddhanepsayā //
T09bsa032_u:3968: diśaḥ pradhāvanti tadunmumukṣayā na cāntamāyāntyaśubhasya nāyuṣaḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3969: ātakṣya takṣāṇa ivāpareṣāṃ gātrāni raudrā viniyamya yāmyāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3972: na cāyānti nāśaṃdhṛtā duṣkṛtaiḥ svaistathā cāpare khaṇḍaśaśchidyamānāḥ //
T09bsa032_u:3977: duḥkhe mahatyavikale 'pi ca no mriyante yāvatparikṣayamupaiti na karma
T09bsa032_u:3980: samāni pañcāpi samāśatāni saṃcūrṇyamānā visṛjanti nāsūn // Jm_29.29 //
T09bsa032_u:3982: pāṭyanta ūrdhvamadha eva ca kṛṣyamāṇāḥ krūrai ravairapuruṣaiḥ puruṣairyamasya // Jm_29.30
T09bsa032_u:3987: rāraṭyante tīvrarujāviṣṭaśarīrāḥ pratyāyyante te ca tadānīṃ paralokam //
T09bsa032_u:3989: kecittīkṣṇaiḥ śastravarṣaiḥ kṣatāṅgā nistvaṅmāṃsā vyālasaṃghaiḥ kriyante
T09bsa032_u:3990: kecitklāntā vahnisaṃsparśatīkṣṇaṃ kṣāraṃ toyaṃ vaitaraṇyāṃ viśanti /
T09bsa032_u:3991: saṃśīryante yatra māṃsāni teṣāṃ no tu prāṇā duṣkṛtairdhāryamāṇā //
T09bsa032_u:3996: pāṭyante krakacairjvaladbhirapare kecinniśātaiḥ kṣuraiḥ kecinmudgaravegapiṣṭaśirasaḥ kūjanti śokāturāḥ /
T09bsa032_u:3998: pāyyante jvalitāgnivarṇamapare lauhaṃ rasanto rasam // Jm_29.37 //
T09bsa032_u:4004: śokāturaṃ śramaviṣādaparītacittaṃ yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam //
T09bsa032_u:4006: prakvāthavegavaśagaṃ vivaśaṃ bhramantaṃ yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam // Jm_29.40 //
T09bsa032_u:4008: nirdahyamānavapuṣaṃ karuṇaṃ rudantaṃ yācedṛṇaṃ ka iva nāma tadā bhavantam
T09bsa032_u:4009: prāptaṃ parābhavaṃ taṃ duḥkhāni mahānti kastadānubhavantam /
T09bsa032_u:4012: vidāryamāṇa bhṛśamārtinādinaṃ paratra kastvārhati yācituṃ dhanam //
T09bsa032_u:4016: viśasanairvividhaiśca sadāturaḥ kathamṛṇaṃ pratidāsyasi me tadā //
T09bsa032_u:4017: atha sa rājā, tāṃ nirayakathāmatibhīṣaṇāṃ samupaśrutya
T09bsa032_u:4020: niśamya tāvannareṣu yātanāṃ bhayādidaṃ vidravatīva me manaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4021: kathaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na tāṃ sameyivān vitakravahnirdahatīva māṃ punaḥ //
T09bsa032_u:4024: tadatra me sādhugatirgatirbhavān parāyaṇaṃ tvaṃ śaraṇaṃ ca me mune //
T09bsa032_u:4025: yathaiva me dṛṣṭitamastvayoddhṛtaṃ divākareṇeva samudyatā tamaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4026: tathaiva mārgaṃ tvamṛṣe pracakṣva me bhajeya yenāhamito na durgatim //
T09bsa032_u:4027: athainaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃvignamānasamṛjūbhūtadṛṣṭiṃ dharmapratipattipātrabhūtamavekṣya piteva putramācārya iva ca śiṣyamanukampamāna iti samanuśaśāsa -
T09bsa032_u:4028: suśiṣyavṛttyā śramaṇadvijeṣu pūrve guṇaprema yathā vicakruḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4029: nṛpāḥ svavṛttyā ca dayāṃ prajāsu kīrtikṣamaḥ sa tridivasya panthāḥ //
T09bsa032_u:4030: adharmamasmād bhṛśadurjayaṃ jayan kadaryabhāvaṃ ca durutaraṃ taran /
T09bsa032_u:4031: upaihi ratnātiśayojjvalaṃ jvalan divaspateḥ kāñcanagopuraṃ puram //
T09bsa032_u:4034: tvayā hi saddarśanasādhunādhunā narendra vṛttena yiyāsatā satā /
T09bsa032_u:4035: yadaiva citte guṇarūkṣatā kṣatā tadaiva te mārgakṛtāspadaṃ padam //
T09bsa032_u:4036: kuruṣva tasmād guṇasādhanaṃ dhanaṃ śivāṃ ca loke svahitodayāṃ dayām /
T09bsa032_u:4037: sthiraṃ ca śīlendriyasaṃvaraṃ varaṃ paratra hi syādaśivaṃ na tena te //
T09bsa032_u:4041: tvamatra sanmānasasārathī rathī sva eva deho guṇasūratho rathaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4048: caran parātmārthamamohabhāsvatā na jātu rājannirayaṃ gamiṣyasi // Jm_29.58
T09bsa032_u:4049: iti sa mahātmā tasya rājñastadasaddarśanāndhakāraṃ bhāsvarairvacanakiraṇairvyavadhūya prakāśya cāsmai sugatimārgaṃ tatraivāntardadhe /
T09bsa032_u:4050: atha sa rājā samupalabdhaparalokavṛttāntatattvaḥ pratilabdhasamyagdarśanacetāḥ sāmātyapaurajānapado dānadamasaṃyamaparāyaṇo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:4054: evamāsādanāmapi santastaddhitopadeśena pratinudanti kṣamāparicayānna pāruṣyeṇeti satpraśaṃsāyāṃ kṣāmāvarṇe 'pi vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:4058: 30. Hastijātakam parahitodarkaṃ duḥkhamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante /
T09bsa032_u:4060: bodhisattvaḥ kila anyatamasmin nāgavane puṣpaphalapallavālakṣitaśikharairalaṃkṛta iva tatra taruvarataruṇairvividhavīruttarutṛṇapihitabhūmibhāge vanarāmaṇīyakanibaddhahṛdayairanutkaṇṭhitamadhyāsyamāna iva parvatasthalairāśrayabhūte vanacarāṇāṃ gambhīravipulasalilāśayasanāthe
T09bsa032_u:4061: mahatā nirvṛkṣakṣupasalilena kāntāreṇa samantatastiraskṛtajanānte mahākāya ekacaro hastī babhūva
T09bsa032_u:4062: sa tatra taruparṇena bisena salilena ca /
T09bsa032_u:4063: abhireme tapasvīva saṃtoṣeṇa śamena ca // Jm_30.1 //
T09bsa032_u:4064: atha kadācitsa mahāsattvastasya vanasya paryante vicaran yatastatkāntāraṃ tato janaśabdamupaśuśrāva
T09bsa032_u:4065: tasya cintā prādurabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvidam? na tāvadanena pradeśena kaściddeśāntaragāmī mārgo 'sti /
T09bsa032_u:4066: evaṃ mahatkāntāraṃ ca vyatītya mṛgayāpi na yujyate prāgeva mahāsamārambhaparikhedamasmatsayūthyagrahaṇam
T09bsa032_u:4068: nirvāsitā vā kruddhena rājñā svenānayena vā // Jm_30.2 //
T09bsa032_u:4071: tajjñāsyāmi tāvadenamiti sa mahāsattvaḥ karuṇayā samākṛṣyamāṇo yataḥ sa jananirghoṣo babhūva tataḥ prasasāra /
T09bsa032_u:4072: viṣpaṣṭataravilāpaṃ ca viṣādadainyavirasaṃ tamākranditaśabdamupaśṛṇvan kāruṇyaparyutsukamanāḥ sa mahātmā drutataraṃ tato 'bhyagacchat /
T09bsa032_u:4073: nirgamya ca tasmādvanagahanānnirvṛkṣakṣupatvāttasya deśasya dūra evāvalokayan dadarśa saptamātrāṇi puruṣaśatāni kṣuttarṣapariśramamandāni tadvanamabhimukhāni prārthayamānāni /
T09bsa032_u:4074: te 'pi ca puruṣāstaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dadṛśurjaṅgamamiva himagiriśikharaṃ hīnārapuñjamiva śaradvalāhakamiva pavanabalāvarjitamabhimukhamāyāntam /
T09bsa032_u:4075: dṛṣṭvā ca viṣādadainyaparītā hantedānīṃ naṣṭā vayamiti bhayagrastamanaso 'pi
T09bsa032_u:4079: atha bodhisattvo bhītānavetyaitān - mā bhaiṣṭa, bhaiṣṭa na vo bhayamasti matta iti samucchritena snigdhābhitāmrapṛthupuṣkareṇa kareṇa
T09bsa032_u:4080: samāśvāsayannabhigamya karuṇāyamāṇaḥ papraccha - ke 'trabhavantaḥ? kena cemāṃ daśāmanuprāptāḥ
T09bsa032_u:4083: śokaklamārtāḥ ke yūyamiha cābhigatāḥ kutaḥ // Jm_30.5 //
T09bsa032_u:4084: atha te puruṣāstasya tena mānuṣeṇābhivyāhāreṇābhayapradānābhivyañjakena cābhyupapattisaumukhyena pratyāgatahṛdayāḥ samabhipraṇamyainamūcuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:4088: suhṛdvandhuviśiṣṭena yad dṛṣṭā bhavatā vayam // Jm_30.7 //
T09bsa032_u:4090: svapne 'pi tvadvidhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko hi nāpadamuttaret // Jm_30.8 //
T09bsa032_u:4091: athainān sa dviradavara uvāca - atha kiyanto 'trabhavanta iti? manuṣyā ūcuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:4094: etāni tu syurdviradapradhāna saptāvaśeṣāṇi nṛṇāṃ śatāni /
T09bsa032_u:4095: nimajjatāṃ mṛtyumukhe tu yeṣāṃ mūrtastvamāśvāsa ivābhyupetaḥ // Jm_30.10
T09bsa032_u:4098: ghṛṇāvimuktā bata nirvyapatrapā nṛpasya buddhiḥ paralokanirvyathā /
T09bsa032_u:4099: aho taḍiccañcalayā nṛpaśriyā hṛtendriyāṇāṃ svahitānavekṣitā // Jm_30.11 //
T09bsa032_u:4100: avaiti manye na sa mṛtyumagrataḥ śṛṇoti pāpasya na vā durantatām /
T09bsa032_u:4101: aho batānāthatamā narāḍhipā vimarśamāndyādvacanakṣamā na ye // Jm_30.12 //
T09bsa032_u:4104: idaṃ sattveṣu nairghṛṇyaṃ dhigaho bata mūḍhatām // Jm_30.13 //
T09bsa032_u:4105: atha tasya dviradapatestān puruṣān karuṇāsnigdhamavekṣamāṇasya cintā prādurabhūt evamamī kṣuttarṣaśramapīḍitāḥ paridurbalaśarīrā nirudakamapracchāyamanekayojanāyānaṃ kāntāramapathyādanāḥ kathaṃ
T09bsa032_u:4106: vyatiyāsyanti? nāgavane 'pi ca kiṃ tadasti yenaiṣāmekāhamapi tāvadaparikleśena vārtā syāt? śakyeyuḥ punarete madīyāni māṃsāni pātheyatāmupanīya dṛtibhiriva ca mamāntraiḥ salilamādāya
T09bsa032_u:4111: durlabhaṃ ca tadeteṣāṃ maivaṃ vilayamāgamat // Jm_30.15 //
T09bsa032_u:4113: āpadgatā bandhuvivarjitāśca mayā viśeṣeṇa yato 'nukampyāḥ // Jm_30.16 //
T09bsa032_u:4116: athainamanye kṣuttarṣaśramadharmaduḥkhāturaśarīrāḥ kṛtāñjalayaḥ sāśrunayanāḥ samabhipraṇamyārtatayā hastasaṃjñābhiḥ pānīyamayācanta /
T09bsa032_u:4117: tvaṃ no bandhurabandhūnāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ ca naḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4118: yathā vetsi mahābhāga tathā nastrātumarhasi // Jm_30.18 //
T09bsa032_u:4120: apare tvenaṃ dhīrataramanasaḥ salilapradeśaṃ kāntāradurgottāraṇāya ca mārgaṃ papracchuḥ -
T09bsa032_u:4121: jalāśayaḥ śītajalā saridvā yadyatra vā nairjharamasti toyam /
T09bsa032_u:4122: chāyādrumaḥ śādvalamaṇḍalaṃ vā tannod vipānāmadhipa pracakṣva // Jm_30.19
T09bsa032_u:4125: anukampāṃ puraskṛtya tāṃ diśaṃ sādhu nirdiśa // Jm_30.20 //
T09bsa032_u:4126: saṃbahulāni hi dinānyatra naḥ kāntāre paribhramatām /
T09bsa032_u:4128: atha sa mahātmā taiḥ karuṇaiḥ prayācitaisteṣāṃ bhṛśataramākleditahṛdayo yatastatkāntāraṃ śakyaṃ nistartu babhūva, tata esāṃ parvatasthalaṃ
T09bsa032_u:4131: tatna ca vyapanītagharmatarṣaklamāstasyaiva nātīdūre 'smātparvatasthalātpatitasya hastinaḥ śarīraṃ drakṣyatha /
T09bsa032_u:4132: tasya māṃsāni pātheyatāmānīya dṛtibhiriva tasyāntraiḥ salilamupagṛhyānayaiva diśā yātavyam
T09bsa032_u:4134: iti sa mahātmā tān puruṣān samāśvāsanapūrvakaṃ tataḥ prasthāpya tato drutataramanyena mārgeṇa tadgiriśikharamāruhya tasya janakāyasya nistāraṇāpekṣayā svaśarīraṃ tato mumukṣurniyatamiti praṇidhimupabṛṃhayāmāsa -
T09bsa032_u:4135: nāyaṃ prayatnaḥ sugatiṃ mamāptuṃ naikātapatrāṃ manujendralakṣmīm /
T09bsa032_u:4136: sukhaprakarṣaikarasāṃ na ca dyāṃ brāhmīṃ śriyaṃ naiva na mokṣasaukhyam //
T09bsa032_u:4137: yatvasti puṇyaṃ mama kiṃcidevaṃ kāntāramagnaṃ janamujjihīrṣoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4138: saṃsārakāntāragatasya tena lokasya nistārayitā bhaveyam // Jm_30.22 //
T09bsa032_u:4139: iti viniścitya sa mahātmā pramodādagaṇitaprapātaniṣpeṣamaraṇaduḥkhaṃ svaśarīraṃ tasmād giritaṭādyathoddeśaṃ mumoca -
T09bsa032_u:4140: reje tataḥ sa nipatañcharadīva meghaḥ paryastabimba iva cāstagireḥ śaśāṅkaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4141: tārkṣyasya pakṣapavanograjavāpaviddhaṃ śṛṇgaṃ gireriva ca tasya himottarīyam // Jm_30.23 //
T09bsa032_u:4142: ākampayannatha dharāṃ dharaṇīdharāṃśca mārasya ca prabhumadādhyuṣitaṃ ca cetaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4153: tamarcituṃ bhaktivaśena kecana vyarāsayan dyāṃ suradundubhisvanaiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4155: diśaḥ saratkāntimayīṃ dadhuḥ śriyaṃ raveḥ karāḥ prāṃśutarā ivābhavan /
T09bsa032_u:4157: atha te puruṣāḥ krameṇa tatsaraḥ samupetya tasmin vinītadharmatarṣaklamā yathākathitaṃ tena mahātmanā tadavidūre hastiśarīraṃ naciramṛtaṃ dadṛśuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4158: teṣāṃ buddhirabhavat - aho yathāyaṃ sadṛśastasya dviradapaterhastī /
T09bsa032_u:4159: bhrātā nu tasyaiṣa mahādvipasya syād bāndhavo vānyatamaḥ suto vā /
T09bsa032_u:4161: tasyaiva khalvasya sitādriśobhaṃ saṃcūrṇitasyāpi vibhāti rūpam // Jm_30.31
T09bsa032_u:4164: atha tatraikeṣāṃ nipuṇataramanupaśyatāṃ buddhirabhavat - yathā paśyāmaḥ sa
T09bsa032_u:4165: eva khalvayaṃ digvāreṇendrapratispardhirūpātiśayaḥ kuñjaravara āpadgatānāmabandhusuhṛdāmasmākaṃ nistāraṇāpekṣayā giritaṭādasmānnipatita iti /
T09bsa032_u:4167: vyaktamasyaiva patataḥ sa cāsmābhirdhvaniḥ śrutaḥ // Jm_30.33 //
T09bsa032_u:4168: etadvapuḥ khalu tadeva mṛṇālagauraṃ candraṃśuśuklatanujaṃ tanubinducitram
T09bsa032_u:4169: kūrmopamāḥ sitanakhāścaraṇāsta ete vaṃśaḥ sa eva ca dhanurmadhurānato 'yam
T09bsa032_u:4173: ādeśayan mārgamimaṃ ca yenaḥ sa eṣa dīrghāṅgalipuṣkaraḥ karaḥ // Jm_30.36
T09bsa032_u:4176: suhṛttvamasmāsu batedamīdṛśaṃ suhṛtsu vā bandhuṣu vāsya kīdṛśam //
T09bsa032_u:4180: ko 'pyeṣa manye dviradāvabhāsaḥ siṣatsatāmudvahatīva vṛttam // Jm_30.38 //
T09bsa032_u:4182: na rūpaśobhā ramate vinā guṇairjano yadityāha tadetadīkṣyate // Jm_30.39

T09bsa032_u:4690: tathā vipāko 'pyaśubhasya durgatiścitrasya dharmasya sukhāśrayā gatiḥ //
T09bsa032_u:4691: ityanunīya sa mahātmā pitaraṃ kṛtābhyanujñaḥ pitrā tṛṇavadapāsya rājyalakṣmīṃ tapovanāśrayaṃ cakāra /
T09bsa032_u:4692: tatra ca dhyānānyapramāṇāni cotpādya teṣu ca pratiṣṭhāpya lokaṃ brahmalokamadhiroha /
T09bsa032_u:4693: tadevaṃ saṃvignamanasāṃ rājalakṣmīrapi śreyomārgaṃ nāvṛṇotīti saṃvegaparicayaḥ kāryaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4700: evaṃ vane dharmaḥ sukhaṃ pratipattuṃ na geha ityevamapyunneyam /
T09bsa032_u:4703: 33. Mahiṣajātakam sati kṣantavye kṣamā syānnāsatītyapakāriṇāmapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante /
T09bsa032_u:4705: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasminnaraṇyapradeśe paṅkasaṃparkātparuṣavapurṇīlameghaviccheda iva pādacārī vanamahiṣavṛṣo babhūva /
T09bsa032_u:4706: sa tasyāṃ durlabhadharmasaṃjñāyāṃ saṃmohabahulāyāmapi tiryaggatau vartamānaḥ paṭuvijñānatvānna dharmacaryānirudyogamatirbabhūva /
T09bsa032_u:4707: cirānuvṛttyevaḥ nibaddhabhāvā na taṃ kadācitkaruṇā mumoca /
T09bsa032_u:4708: ko 'pi prabhāva sa tu karmaṇo vā tasyaiva vā yatsa tathā babhūva //
T09bsa032_u:4710: kṛpātmakaḥ sannapi yatsa bheje tiryaggatiṃ tatra ca dharmasaṃjñām //
T09bsa032_u:4711: vinā na karmāsti gatiprabandhaḥ śubhaṃ na cāniṣṭavipākamasti /
T09bsa032_u:4712: sa dharmasaṃjñīpi tu karmaleśāṃstāṃstān samāsādya tathā tathāsīt //
T09bsa032_u:4713: athānyatamo duṣṭavānarastasya kālāntarābhivyaktāṃ prakṛtibhadratāṃ dayānuvṛttyā ca vigatakrodhasaṃrambhatāmavetya nāsmādbhayamastīti taṃ mahāsattvaṃ tena tena vihiṃsākrameṇa bhṛśataramabādhata /
T09bsa032_u:4714: dayāmṛduṣu durjanaḥ paṭutarāvalepodbhavaḥ parāṃ vrajati vikriyāṃ na hi bhayaṃ tataḥ paśyati
T09bsa032_u:4715: yatastu bhayaśaṅkayā sukṛśayāpi saṃspṛśyate vinīta iva nīcakaiścarati tatra śāntoddhavaḥ // sa kadācittasya mahāsattvasya visrabdhaprasuptasya nidrāvaśādvā pracalāyataḥ sahasaivopari nipatati sma /
T09bsa032_u:4719: salilāvagāhanasamutsukasyāpyasya kadācicchiraḥ samabhiruhya pāṇibhyāṃ nayane samāvavre /
T09bsa032_u:4722: bodhisattvo 'pi mahasattvaḥ sarvaṃ tadasyāvinayaceṣṭitamupakāramiva manyamāno niḥsaṃkṣobhasaṃrambhamanyurmarṣayāmāsa
T09bsa032_u:4724: abhyāsāttatra ca satāmupakāra iva kṣamā // Jm_33.5 //
T09bsa032_u:4725: atha kilānyatamo yakṣastamasya paribhavamamṛṣyamāno bhāvaṃ vā jijñāsamānastasya mahāsattvasya tena duṣṭakapinā vāhyamānaṃ taṃ mahiṣavṛṣabhaṃ mārge sthitvedamuvācamā tāvadbhoḥ kiṃ parikrīto 'syanena
T09bsa032_u:4726: duṣṭakapinā? atha dyūte parājitaḥ? utāho bhayamasmātkiṃcidāśaṅkase? utāho balamātmagataṃ nāveṣi yadevamanena paribhūya vāhyase? nanu bhoḥ
T09bsa032_u:4729: idaṃ ca śailopamasaṃhatasthiraṃ samagraśobhaṃ balasaṃpadā vapuḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4731: mathāna dhṛtvā tadimaṃ kṣureṇa vā viṣāṇakoṭyā madamasya voddhara /
T09bsa032_u:4733: asajjanaḥ kutra yathā cikitsyate guṇānuvṛttyā sukhaśīlasaumyayā /
T09bsa032_u:4734: kaṭuṣṇarūkṣākṣi hi yatra siddhaye kaphātmako roga iva prasarpati //
T09bsa032_u:4736: avaimyenaṃ calaṃ nūnaṃ sadā cāvinaye ratam /
T09bsa032_u:4737: ata eva mayā tvasya yuktaṃ marṣayituṃ nanu // Jm_33.10 //
T09bsa032_u:4739: vinayācāraśīreṣu kṣantavyaṃ kiṃ ca sādhuṣu // Jm_33.11 //
T09bsa032_u:4743: asatkriyā hīnabalāścca nāma nirdeśakālaḥ paramo guṇānām /
T09bsa032_u:4745: nityaṃ kṣamāyāśca nanu kṣamāyāḥ kālaḥ parāyattayā durāpaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4746: pareṇa tasminnupapādite ca tatraiva kopapraṇa kopapraṇakramaḥ kaḥ //
T09bsa032_u:4748: na cetkṣamāmapyahamatra kuryāmanya kṛtaghno bata kīdṛśaḥ syāt // Jm_33.15
T09bsa032_u:4749: yakṣa uvāca - tena hi na tvamasyāḥ kacācitprabādhanāyā mokṣyase -
T09bsa032_u:4753: parasya pīḍāpraṇayena yatsukhaṃ nivāraṇaṃ syādasukhodayasya vā /
T09bsa032_u:4754: sukhārthinastanna niṣevituṃ kṣamaṃ na tadvipāko hi sukhaprasiddhaye //
T09bsa032_u:4757: asatkriyāṃ prāpya ca tadvidhājjanānna mādṛśe 'pyevamasau kariṣyati /
T09bsa032_u:4759: na labdhadoṣo hi punastathācaredataśca muktirmama sā bhaviṣayti //
T09bsa032_u:4760: atha yakṣastaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prasādavismayabahumānāvarjitamatiḥ sādhu sādhviti saśiraḥprakampāṅgalivikṣepamabhisaṃrādhya tattatpriyamuvāca -
T09bsa032_u:4762: kayāpi buddhyā tvidamāsthito vapustapovane ko 'pi bhavāṃstapasyati //
T09bsa032_u:4763: ityenamabhipraśasya taṃ cāsya duṣṭavānaraṃ pṛṣṭhādavadhūya samādiśya cāsya rakṣāvidhānaṃ tatraivāntardadhe
T09bsa032_u:4764: tadevaṃ sati kṣantavye kṣamā syānnāsatītyapakāriṇamapi sādhavo lābhamiva bahu manyante iti kṣāntikathāyāṃ vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:4766: ko nāma manuṣyabhūtaḥ pravrajitapratijño vā tadvikalaḥ śobheta? ityevamapi vācyam /
T09bsa032_u:4772: bodhisattvaḥ kilānyatamasmin vanapradeśe nānāvidharāgaruciracitrapatraḥ śatapatro babhūva
T09bsa032_u:4774: bālaiḥ pravālaiḥ sa mahīruhāṇāṃ puṣpādhivāsairmadhubhiśca hyadyaiḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4776: dharmaṃ parebhyaḥ pravadan yathārhamārtān yathāśakti samuddharaṃśca /
T09bsa032_u:4778: iti paripālyamānastena mahāsattvena tasmin vanapradeśe sattvakāyaḥ sācāryaka iva bandhumāniva savidya iva rājanvāniva sukhamabhyavardhata /
T09bsa032_u:4780: sa sattvakāyo 'pi tathaiva tena saṃrakṣyamāṇo guṇavṛddhimāpa // Jm_34.3 //
T09bsa032_u:4781: atha kadācitsa mahāsattvaḥ sattvānukampayā vanāntarāṇi samanuvicaraṃstīvravedanābhibhavādviceṣṭamānaṃ digdhaviddhamivānyatamasmin vanapradeśe reṇusaṃparkavyākulamalinake sarasaṭaṃ sihaṃ dadarśa samabhigamya cainaṃ karuṇayā paricodyamānaḥ papraccha - kimidaṃ mṛgarāja?
T09bsa032_u:4784: kṛtaṃ tavāsvāsthyamidaṃ śrameṇa vyādheṣuṇā vā rujayā kayācit // Jm_34.4 //
T09bsa032_u:4785: tad brūhi vācyaṃ mayi cedidaṃ te yadeva vā kṛtyamihocyatāṃ tat /
T09bsa032_u:4786: mamāsti yā mitragatā ca śaktistatsādhyasaukhyasya bhavān sukhī ca //
T09bsa032_u:4788: siṃha uvāca - sādho pakṣivara na me śramajātamidamasvāsthyaṃ rujayā
T09bsa032_u:4790: idaṃ tvasthiśakalaṃ galāntare vilagnaṃ śalyamiva māṃ bhṛśaṃ dunoti /
T09bsa032_u:4793: yathedānīṃ jānāsi, tathā māṃ sukhinaṃ kuruṣveti /
T09bsa032_u:4794: atha bodhisattvaḥ paṭuvijñānatvādvicintya śalyoddharaṇopāyaṃ tadvacanaviṣkambhapramāṇaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya taṃ siṃhamuvāca - yā te śaktistayā
T09bsa032_u:4797: atha bodhisattvastadasya kāṣṭhaṃ dantapālyorantare samyagniveśya praviśya cāsya galamūlaṃ tattiryagavasthitimasthiśakalaṃ vadanāgreṇābhihṛtyaikasmin pradeśe samutpāditaśaithilyamitarasmin parigṛhya paryante vicakarṣa /
T09bsa032_u:4801: uddhṛtya śalyena sahaiva tasya duḥkhaṃ ca tatsaṃjanitāṃ śucaṃ ca /
T09bsa032_u:4804: prasādhya saukhyaṃ vyasanaṃ nivartya vā sahāpi duḥkhena parasya sajjanaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4805: upaiti tāṃ prītiviśeṣasaṃpadaṃ na yāṃ svasaukhyeṣu sukhāgateṣvapi //
T09bsa032_u:4806: iti sa mahāsattvastasya tadduḥkhamupaśamayya prītahṛdayastamāmantrya siṃhaṃ pratinanditastena yatheṣṭaṃ jagāma /
T09bsa032_u:4807: atha sa kadācitpravitataruciracitrapatraḥ śatapatraḥ paribhraman kiṃcitkvacit tadvidhamāhārajātamanāsādya kṣudagniparigatatanustameva siṃhamacirahastasya hariṇataruṇasya māṃsamupabhuñjānaṃ tadrudhirānurañjitavadananakharakesarāgraṃ saṃdhyāprabhāsamālabdhaṃ śaranmeghavicchedamiva dadarśa /
T09bsa032_u:4808: kṛtopakāro 'pi tu na prasehe vaktuṃ sa yācñāvirasākṣaraṃ tam /
T09bsa032_u:4809: viśāradasyāpi hi tasya lajjā tatkālamaunavratamādideśa // Jm_34.9 //
T09bsa032_u:4810: kāryānurodhāttu tathāpi tasya cakṣuṣpathe hrīvidhuraṃ cacāra /
T09bsa032_u:4812: sa cānupaśyannapi taṃ durātmā nimantraṇāmapyakaronna tasya // Jm_34.10 //
T09bsa032_u:4813: śilātale bījamiva prakīrṇaṃ hutaṃ ca śāntoṣmaṇi bhasmapuñje /
T09bsa032_u:4814: samaprakāraṃ phalayogakāle kṛtaṃ kṛtaghne vidule ca puṣpam // Jm_34.11 //
T09bsa032_u:4815: atha bodhisattvo nūnamayaṃ māṃ na pratyabhijānīta iti nirviśaṅkataraḥ samabhigamyainamarthivṛttyā prayuktayuktāśīrvādaḥ saṃvibhāgamayācata -
T09bsa032_u:4819: didhakṣanniva vivartitayā dṛṣṭyā bodhisattvamīkṣamāṇa uvāca - mā tavadbhoḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4820: dayāklaibyaṃ na yo veda khādana visphurato mṛgān /
T09bsa032_u:4821: praviśya tasya me vaktraṃ yajjīvasi na tadbahu // Jm_34.13 //
T09bsa032_u:4823: jīvitena nu khinno 'si paraṃ lokaṃ didṛkṣase // Jm_34.14 //
T09bsa032_u:4824: atha bodhisattvastena tasya rūkṣākṣarakrameṇa pratyākhyānavacasā samupajātavrīḍastatraiva nabhaḥ samutpapāta /
T09bsa032_u:4826: athānyatamā vanadevatā tasya tamasatkāramasahamānā dhairyaprayāmajijñāsayā vā samutpatya taṃ mahāsattvamuvāca - pakṣivara, kasmādimamasatkāramasya durātmanaḥ kṛtopakāraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4829: śaktastvamasya nayane vadanābhighātād visphūrjitaḥ pramathituṃ balaśālino
T09bsa032_u:4831: daṃṣṭrāntarasthamapi cāmiṣamasya hartuṃ tanmṛṣyate kimayamasya balāvalepaḥ
T09bsa032_u:4832: atha bodhisattvastathāpyasatkāraviprakṛtaḥ protsāhyamāno 'pi tayā vanadevatayā svāṃ prakṛtibhadratāṃ pradarśayannuvāca - alamalamanena krameṇa /
T09bsa032_u:4834: ārte pravṛttiḥ sādhūnāṃ kṛpayā na tu lipsayā /
T09bsa032_u:4835: tāmavaitu paro mā vā tatra kopasya ko vidhiḥ // Jm_34.16 //
T09bsa032_u:4836: vañcanā sā ca tasyaiva yanna vetti kṛtaṃ paraḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4837: ko hi pratyupakārārthī tasya bhūyaḥ kariṣyati // Jm_34.17 //
T09bsa032_u:4843: upakṛtaṃ kila vetti na me parastadapakāramiti prakaroti yaḥ /
T09bsa032_u:4844: nanu viśodhya guṇaiḥ sa yaśastanuṃ dviradavṛttimabhipratipadyate //
T09bsa032_u:4845: na vetti cedupakṛtamāturaḥ paro na yokṣyate 'pi sa guṇakāntayā śriyā /
T09bsa032_u:4846: sacetasaḥ punaratha ko bhavetkramaḥ samucchritaṃ pramathitumātmano yaśaḥ
T09bsa032_u:4850: atha sā devatā tatsubhāṣitaprasāditamanāḥ sādhu sādhviti punaruktamabhipraśasya tattatpriyamuvāca
T09bsa032_u:4852: na veṣamātraṃ hi munitvasiddhaye guṇairupetastviha tattvato muniḥ //
T09bsa032_u:4856: evaṃ kṣāntikathāyāmapyupaneyam - evaṃ kṣamāparicayānna vairabahulo bhavati, nāvadyabahulo bahujanapriyo manoṅaśceti /
T09bsa032_u:4857: evaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabahulāḥ svāṃ guṇaśobhāmanurakṣanti paṇḍitā iti pratisaṃkhyānavarṇe vācyam
T09bsa032_u:4858: tathāgatamāhātmye ca bhadraprakṛtyabhyāsavarṇe ca - evaṃ bhadraprakṛtirabhyastā tiryaggatānāmapi na nivartata iti /
